text: I found out accidentaly that while my uncle was away in Canada, my aunt had been bedding a young man on a regular basis.

label: shame
text: It was during a school holiday - I was found necking a girl in my room by my father.

label: guilt
text: I was in grade seven and my class was planning a protest against a rude and immoral teacher.  I sneaked out and told the headmaster about it and so the plan was foiled.

label: joy
text: I won the first prize at the science fair, the first of the kind at school and I was only in form II then.

label: fear
text: A close relative of mine died in a serious car accident.  I was one of the first two people to see the corpse and I had to do it.  Before going in to see it I was afraid as it was the first time that I was seeing a corpse.

label: anger
text: My younger brother destroyed and gave away some of the books that I had intended to keep for as long as possible.

label: sadness
text: When a close relative of mine passed away, it was the first time that someone so close to me had died.

label: disgust
text: A person whom I thought to be honest took and spend the little money that I had and I had no way of getting any money in the few following months.

label: shame
text: While watching a religious film, I got very excited and made a number of comments which were reproached to me by an elderly person who respected me.

label: guilt
text: I beat up a female friend after I heard the defamatory stories that she had been telling.  I was later called to explain my behaviour.

label: joy
text: My 21st birthday celebration, when I cut the cake and received the presents.

label: fear
text: Before one of my final exams of the third year - natural sciences.

label: anger
text: When some seniors tried to scold and insult some juniors on account of what the juniors were supposed to have said at secondary school.

label: sadness
text: When an uncle of mine, who was close to me, passed away after having had a stroke, before his first daughter could be named.

label: disgust
text: When my sister's boyfriend accused her of having been sleeping around.

label: shame
text: When I could not hold my bladder while making a telephone call and ended up wetting myself.

label: guilt
text: When I was made to feel responsible for the emotional state a friend of mine was in.

label: sadness
text: My fiancT left me for my best friend.

label: disgust
text: People who discriminate other people disgust me.

label: shame
text: On New Years eve I drank too much alcohol, so much that I had to vomit in the presence of other people.

label: guilt
text: I have cut loose from my father a few years ago. I know he is very sad about this.

label: joy
text: A recurrent lovesickness.

label: fear
text: I was sexually assaulted one night by a stranger.

label: anger
text: Meddlesomeness of my mother about the way I live. She thinks I am to free in my behavior for instance when a boyfriend stays the night.

label: sadness
text: The dying of a close member of the family.

label: disgust
text: Seeing maltreated, dead animals.

label: shame
text: A much older man took advantage of me during my childhood (four to eight years of age).

label: guilt
text: When my friend needed my help very much and I, at that moment, made an end to our relationship.

label: joy
text: When I passed a very important exam.

label: fear
text: When a man rang the doorbell and wanted to enter the house with violence. I was alone at home that moment.

label: anger
text: A friend came to visit me late one night. He promised to stay only a quarter of an hour, but he stayed 5 hours !! He didn't leave and I was very angry.

label: sadness
text: I had to terminate a training because I wasn't suited for it. I was very sad about this, because I very much wanted to finish that training.

label: disgust
text: During my birthday party a friend drank too much alcohol. So much that he had to throw up. Worst of all was that he couldn't leave my friend alone and that he was molesting her.

label: shame
text: I tried to swindle a jeweller because my watch was broken and I wanted to have it repaired it was a pity but they detected it.

label: guilt
text: Someone had to do a lot of efforts to make something work. With my help he would have finished much sooner, but I wasn't in the mood to help him.

label: joy
text: I went to visit friends and it was very companionable.

label: fear
text: I wanted to get in contact with a girl I loved, but I was afraid she would refuse me.

label: anger
text: During military service a superior reproached me unjustly. This led to friction in a lot of situations.

label: sadness
text: Disappointed love. The girl made an end to our relationship while I thought she was in love with me.

label: disgust
text: During military service I heard the story of someone who tried to commit suicide and as a result of this got a week custody.

label: shame
text: I thought of myself as being clumsy when I made love for the first time with a girl.

label: guilt
text: A friend of mine had a bicycle-accident because I pulled at his handlebar.

label: joy
text: Sitting alone in a quiet room concentrating on things happening around me which pleases me.

label: fear
text: Sitting alone in a quiet room, concetrating on things happening around you. Thoughts come into my mind which make me afraid.

label: anger
text: When a teacher tells a story which isn't true. It only reflects his way of interpreting reality.

label: sadness
text: I have high expectations for my future but if I pursue the subject in this manner I will not attain this.

label: disgust
text: I heard a broadcasting programme about parapsychology. The people in this programme used very difficult words which I couldn't understand. They acted exaggerated without showing any feeling.

label: shame
text: A girl asked me why I didn't dance. I told her I was ashamed to dance. I felt myself ashamed having to tell her this.

label: guilt
text: I saved up money for a good purpose. As I also have to organise a party I am afraid there will rest only a little money for the good purpose I feel guilty about this.

label: joy
text: My sister and brother in law returned from Sri Lanka where they adopted a child. I went to pick them up at the airport.

label: fear
text: During a football game I made an offence towards an acquaintance. Later on this acquaintance also tackeled me and the game became very rude.

label: anger
text: I work at a petrol station. When there is a foreigner who wants petrol my collegues treat him very impolite.

label: sadness
text: An uncle of mine who just retired, having worked hard all his life, got a cerebral hemorrhage.

label: disgust
text: A student who lives in the same house where I live is an alcoholic. He tries to manipulate other people with his money when he has drunk too much.

label: shame
text: When I went to a disco with a friend I started behaving badly embarrassing him without reason.

label: guilt
text: When I talked to another student about the notes she got last semester, not knowing that she got a lot of bad grades.

label: joy
text: When I got my drivers licence.

label: fear
text: When I stayed alone in a house in Great Brittain and there was a lot of rumour in the newspaper about a murderer still being free.

label: anger
text: The stories about the way my grandmother treated my mother.

label: sadness
text: When my mother was proved to suffer from a very serious disease.

label: disgust
text: The stories about my aunt who was beaten and humiliated by my uncle.

label: shame
text: I omitted to do a favor to a friend, while he was very much in need for help.

label: guilt
text: When I had a little accident with my boss'car.

label: joy
text: Every year during carnival I am very joyful I have an intense feeling of happiness then.

label: fear
text: The only event I can remember is having a nightmare when I was very young (3 years old) I dreamt about a machine which was going to crush me.

label: anger
text: I am usually angry at myself. This happens often. For instace when I want to pet without falling in love and it soon proves that I have fallen in love with him.

label: sadness
text: Losing a boyfriend for the second time to my friend. He fell in love with her. The same thing happened a few months earlier with another boyfriend.

label: disgust
text: There is a person whom I disgust. Evrey time I see her I get this terrible feeling I disgust her whole appearance.

label: shame
text: When I am angry at someone without a good reason. Later on it proves that he didn't do anything wrong.

label: guilt
text: My mother always evokes feelings of guilt in me. For instance when I miss the last bus I know she will be concerned for me and stay awake till I arrive.

label: joy
text: When I came again in contact with a girl I liked very much. And most important she also liked me.

label: fear
text: DO NOT REMEMBER.

label: anger
text: After a hard day at the university I also had to make dinner that evening. It failed because of a frying pan which broke.

label: sadness
text: When my father had a cerebral hemorrhage.

label: disgust
text: A story I heard recently about a baby dying after sexual abuse.

label: shame
text: During a party I overheard a conversation about china. When I wanted to give my opinion one of the people came out to be Chinese and his opinion was right of course.

label: guilt
text: When I didn't bring my girlfriend home one night. Later she told me that a cardriver solicited her.

label: joy
text: When an old schoolfriend phoned me to arrange an appointment to talk about old memories. I hadn't seen him for 8 years.

label: fear
text: Standing in a crowed shop or in a closed room with too much people in it. This gives me a fearful experience.

label: anger
text: My older brother who gives me unwanted advices about problems in my relationship with my girlfriend.

label: sadness
text: My girlfriend left the house in which we lived together a few months ago. This made me very sad.

label: disgust
text: When my parents behave very \witty\" towards me, they make insipid jokes about which they laugh. Or my mother who treats me like a little child."

label: shame
text: Making an unexpected talk with a professor in the canteen. This made me shy.

label: guilt
text: Flirting with other girls while I already had a very good relationship. When there are problems in my relationship, the flirting increases as does the feeling of guilt.

label: joy
text: Occurs frequently. A recent experience: when going out with many friends, nice music, after the examinations, I felt so happy I could have embraced everybody.

label: fear
text: I lived alone in a repulsive area in the city of Rotterdam. I was annoyed, heard a lot of Burglary and assaults. Especially in the evening and the night I frequently felt anxious.

label: anger
text: Being treated unfairly and being hurt by someone I love.

label: sadness
text: When I finished a relation after four years, leading to much sorrow for the other one and myself (\although it was the best solution\")."

label: disgust
text: Every time I meet a certain person. We cannot get on well together, we dislike each other.

label: shame
text: When coming up for trial because of shop lifting.

label: guilt
text: Being catched when stealing.

label: joy
text: I fell over head and ears in love with someone who appeared to be in love with me. it made me so happy that I could hardly sleep and eat for one week.

label: fear
text: One night I had to bike home all alone after a party. Then I found out that I was pursued by a man in a car.

label: anger
text: I had a quarrel with my father, because I was of the opinion that he decided in an authoritarian way which TV program we should watch. I became very angry and started throwing things through the room.

label: sadness
text: My boyfriend finished our relationship when I started studying psychology in Nijegen, because then we would not be able to meet frequently anymore.

label: disgust
text: A friend had a quarrel with the mother of her boyfriend because she and her friend decided to go and live together. She needed money for removal, then she made a great effort to reconcile.

label: shame
text: I was catched when, as a little girl, I played tricks. I was very startled then and wet my pants.

label: guilt
text: I was of the opinion that 12.00 pm was too early to be back at home after going out, so I stayed away longer, knowing that my mother would be worried.

label: joy
text: I was called and invited to have a talk about a job I wanted to have.

label: fear
text: Once late at night (around midnight) a person asked me to give him a lift. He suddenly tried to attack me but I could escape. After this he followed me for a little while.

label: anger
text: There was a lot of irritation between me and a person who lives in the same house where I live. Suddenly it became too much for me and I accused him of several things.

label: sadness
text: The end of a relationship (after 4 years) by doing this I hurt the other person very much.

label: disgust
text: I saw a terrible accident in which the driver of a motor was thrown through the frontwindow of a car. His face was completely away.

label: shame
text: I am troubled by hair growing in my neck. I was troubled by this for a long time and was much ashamed when someone brought his/her hands close to my face.

label: guilt
text: Against the will and without the approval of my parents I went for a few days to my boyfriend in Germany.

label: joy
text: When a friend of me came for an unexpected visit.

label: fear
text: When I thought the house was on fire at night.

label: anger
text: When I was at an official meeting I asked a question to a person. His response was not directed at me but at the chairman.

label: sadness
text: When the mother of a good friend of mine died.

label: disgust
text: A teacher was very blunt in his relation to a child so that the child was very upset when arriving at home.

label: shame
text: I was very angry at someone.

label: guilt
text: That I didn't take the time to make an appointment with someone.

label: joy
text: After I saw my family and good friends back after staying one year in a foreign country.

label: fear
text: When a good friend of mine behaved in a very cool manner to me for a very long time.

label: anger
text: I was in the library of medical psychology and walked into the wrong direction. A man who came out of a room threated me very denigrating and I became very angry in a resisting manner.

label: sadness
text: A good friend of mine died. During the funeral I felt an intense feeling of sadness.

label: disgust
text: When an uncle of mine who is very ill started to cough wich sounded very dirty. (He can't help it of course).

label: shame
text: At Christmas night there was a good movie on television which I wanted to see for years. I was whining about it till someone told me it was very childish. Then I felt shame.

label: guilt
text: A good friend of mine who is at the moment in a foreign country. I didn't write her for several months and now I feel guilty.

label: joy
text: When I go out with my friend with enough money and good sense to our favorite dancing.

label: fear
text: When going out I am threatened regularly by two punk-girls.

label: anger
text: A friend started to shout at me. He called me an old frump.

label: sadness
text: My relationship with a boyfriend was finished and I didn't succeed a years-course.

label: disgust
text: My father is someone I disgust. So when he comes close to me a feeling of disgust overwhelms me. When I stay a week-end at my parent's place I will remember it for long time.

label: shame
text: After a party in which I made love with a boy in public. Later on I heard that others were talking about me and called me a slut.

label: guilt
text: When I got associated with a boy one year ago, I neglected my best friend. When the relation with this boy finished she behaved very easy-going towards me. I felt guilty then.

label: joy
text: When I made the winning goal during a very important football game.

label: fear
text: A terrible cloud-burst started when we were camping in a tent on a great bald field.

label: anger
text: Seeing for the first time pictures about the so called \treatment\" of Jewish people in Nazi-Germany during World War II."

label: sadness
text: The death of my mother-in-law after a long sick-bed. at the moment of dying I was with her.

label: disgust
text: I was looking at a one-man show on television. He told very disgusting things so that I started to be disgusted with it. (Later on it proved that this was his intention).

label: shame
text: I was drinking a glass of wine and eating something when there suddenly appeared pictures about the famine in some parts of Africa.

label: guilt
text: When I don't go to my parents on Sunday and phone them to tell them that I have to study. The truth is that I listened to sports on the radio.

label: joy
text: When it appeared that I was not pregnant when I was several weeks overtime.

label: fear
text: The same situation as with sadness. I was afraid about what my parents would further do to distroy my relationship.

label: anger
text: Once again my parents distroyed a relationship.

label: sadness
text: I had this feeling when my parents distroyed a relationship with a boy because they thought he was bad and irresponsible.

label: disgust
text: After the accident which I described in SHAME. I came to myself and saw how terrible everything looked like. I disgusted myself and everything I saw.

label: sadness
text: A sudden end to the relationship with my first girlfriend.

label: disgust
text: I heard part of a conversation in which one talked very low about women.

label: shame
text: In an important situation for me, my father behaved inadequately.

label: guilt
text: When I took the car of someone without saying it to him.

label: joy
text: I felt joy when I heard that I was accepted for the Free University in Driebergen.

label: fear
text: When a good friend of me told me one evening that she didn't want to live anymore.

label: anger
text: I felt anger when at the end of a telephone call, a good friend told me that she would go to travel next year with another good friend. We couldn't talk this out.

label: sadness
text: I was very sad when I had to leave persons with whom I had a very intense relationship I also had to leave the environment which was part of this.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust after watching a picture on television about torturing political prisoners in India (this happened in the India of Indira Ghandi).

label: shame
text: I made a very insulting remark against a person whom I care for very much. This event was caused by a third person who didn't like the person I insulted.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilt towards my mother when I went to live on rooms in Nijmegen where I study.

label: joy
text: When my boyfriend and I went out for a dinner and subsequently went to his family. We had a very nice evening.

label: fear
text: When I walk through streets late at night. This is because I and my friends were attacked one night without any reason for it.

label: anger
text: When I got the feeling that I had to do all the housekeeping while my boyfriend didn't do anything. This happened in a period of exams when I had to study very hard.

label: sadness
text: When my best friend got a boyfriend. Because of this a relationship of ten years was finished abruptely.

label: disgust
text: I feel disgust when hearing or seeing other people being treated inhumanely. For example torturing in chili.

label: shame
text: In my opinion guilt is a feeling which goes together with shame. Here then I refer to the situation of guilt.

label: guilt
text: When I became angry at my boyfriend without any reason. I know he cannot bear me being angry at him and that he can't study anymore then.

label: joy
text: The day I heard that I passed the high school exam.

label: fear
text: I was living in rooms in a very lonely, quiet neigbourhood. During the night it was very silent and this frightened me. The fact of being alone in that house frightened me.

label: anger
text: We had to move to a very different city because the company where my father worked also moved to that place. It was very difficult for me to make new friends than.

label: sadness
text: A very close friend of mine died. I read it in the newspaper. I didn't know what to do and thought about it the whole day.

label: disgust
text: A girl who also hires a room in the house where I live always tries to make a quarrel with everyone available she disgusts me.

label: shame
text: A teacher spent a lot of time helping me without wanting to be paid for it. For the exam I didn't got a good grade and I felt ashamed.

label: guilt
text: I knew I had to take an exam very soon but yet I couldn't start studying. I also knew it was very imprtant to succeed the exam this time.

label: joy
text: When Christmas holiday started, I felt very joyful when I finished my last exam.

label: fear
text: I was raped once when I went through a dark alley at the back of our house. The man pushed me in the bushes. I fought back and succeeded to escape.

label: anger
text: I was very angry at my father when he didn't give me as much money as my brother to use for studying. Once again my brother was better off then me.

label: sadness
text: When my gradmother died.  I felt very sad then ... The feeling started to be worse after a while.

label: disgust
text: When I ate a rotten apple.

label: shame
text: When I didn't meet an appointment I had made. The person phoned me but I thought of something (I told I was ill) so that I didn't have to go.

label: guilt
text: When I have to take exams I am very excited and have not much time for the housekeeping. Then my friend has to do everything.

label: joy
text: My boyfriend was playing with my cat. He was playing games with her and telling nice things to her.

label: fear
text: When I slept for the first time all alone in the house where I live now. A man phoned me at 2.00 am. He wanted something from me. I was afraid.

label: anger
text: My boyfriend told me that I had very high demands towards him. In my opinion this was wrong.

label: sadness
text: I hadn't been at my parent's place for a long time. When I went to visit them I had high expectations, but when I was there it was very different from what I expected.

label: disgust
text: I read a story in the newspaper about butchers treating their animals very badly. They disgusted me.

label: shame
text: I was eating in a very nice restaurant, when the servant asked whether I liked the food I told him that I liked it but that there was one thing which wasn't so good. The servant than worked very hard to make it good.

label: guilt
text: A few weeks ago I thought about an exam I had to take soon. I remembered this just before I had to go to sleep. I felt guilt because at the beginning of the year I planned to succeed.

label: joy
text: During my high school time I succeeded to play a concert of Mozart on the piano when I gave my first performance I succeeded to play it very well.

label: fear
text: When a car ran into me. The moment that I felt on the street I thought \This is my end, I am going to die\"."

label: anger
text: When our cat was killed in a car-accident I was very angry at the driver of the car because he didn't take enough care.

label: sadness
text: There is a boy who I love very much. I asked him to have dinner with me, but he refused I don't know why he didn't go with me, but I felt very lonely.

label: disgust
text: I saw a dog who was eating excrements.

label: shame
text: During my Highschool time I was chairman of the student's comitee. In this function I once had to make a speech to a large audience and I was very nervous. After three sentences I forgot my text.

label: guilt
text: During a holiday in East-Germany I got aquainted with a boy who lived there. We started writing, but I only wrote once. I felt ashamed because I probably was one of his sparse contacts with western Europe.

label: joy
text: When I saw a good friend again after not having seen her for a long time.

label: fear
text: When I slipped on a glazed frost road and a car almost ran into me.

label: anger
text: When people without my permission pry in my belongings and take things out of it.

label: sadness
text: When I noticed that my parents were not in such a prosperity as most people in my surroundings.

label: disgust
text: Seeing a pornographic movie in which animals were used.

label: shame
text: When I went for the first time in my life to a nudist-beach.

label: guilt
text: I was caught sneaking sweets.

label: joy
text: When I went to visit a friend in the hospital. She had to undergo an operation for rupture. I was glad to hear that the operation succeeded and that she was relieved of her pain.

label: fear
text: I had an appointment with a good friend. He came 3 hours later than we agreed upon. During the last hour of waiting I was afraid something might had happened, because usally he is in time.

label: anger
text: I worked together with another student on a computer-assignment. She didn't do her best and didn't prepare herself for it. She expected me to explain it to her.

label: sadness
text: I had a quarrel with a good friend about the fact that I didn't pay her a visit when she expected me to come. Hereafter I was very sad because it became a real quarrel.

label: disgust
text: I was hitch-hiking when a man stopped and gave me a lift to Nijmegen. During the ride he asked me whether I was in for fun. The man was fat and tatooed.

label: shame
text: I forgot something I agreed upon with a good friend.

label: guilt
text: I became very angry with my friend because he didn't do shopping, while we agreed on him doing this. My being angry was proved to be without reason and I felt guilty about it.

label: joy
text: When I got the positive result of my examination to achieve the Bachelor Degree in Plychology.

label: fear
text: When I was 12 years old I frequently was pursued by others and got sound thrashes.

label: anger
text: My girlfriend one day went out and promised to be back at 6.00 pm however she first arrived at 10.00 pm, without a message (we had to go out that evening).

label: sadness
text: When my girlfriend decided to finish our relation.

label: disgust
text: When once again I drank too much and felt very rotten the morning after.

label: shame
text: When I overslept for the second time on the day I had an examination.

label: guilt
text: When having a relationship, I made love with another girl.

label: joy
text: When the girl with whom I am in love smiles at me.

label: fear
text: When biking and I felt very bad (problems with heart and respiration).

label: anger
text: When a discussion resulted in an insult, which in my opinion, was not justified.

label: sadness
text: When I realized that it did not make much sense to start a relationship with a girl who was not very constructive to establish a firm relationship.

label: disgust
text: When I had to finish those big amounts of homework in time.

label: shame
text: When I gave water to the plants of a friend. Then one plant fell over, and a little statue broke. I, of course, had to tell him everything.

label: guilt
text: When I had broken a piece of glass of the refrigerator by putting a hot pan in it.

label: joy
text: On my birthday when several good friends came to visit me.

label: fear
text: I went to the apartment of my boyfriend and saw some people before his door. I thought that something had happened.

label: anger
text: My father called me (behind my mother's back) and told me that my mother disapproved my behavior in the weekend. However, he didn't tell me the details and left me with unanswered questions.

label: sadness
text: I felt very lonely, was very dissatisfied with myself when I realised that I could feel very jealous of other women because of my boyfriend.

label: disgust
text: A scene in a film in which one man repressed another one. By concidence, their position was reversed. The other man was repressed in an identical way as he did before.

label: shame
text: When I do not succeed in making myself clear to other people. When they do not understand what I say.

label: guilt
text: After the death of a girl who I disliked.

label: joy
text: I felt joyful when my boyfriend met me at the station, while at first he had said that he would not do that.

label: fear
text: I was very startled when, at night at 2.00 am, a boy approached me and yelled \I fuck you\", then however he stopped and laughed at me."

label: anger
text: When someone does not listen to me after having asked me to repeat what I said. This happened more than one time with the same person.

label: sadness
text: I felt very sad when I heard that a friend had committed suicide.

label: disgust
text: One night I saw a man being knocked down by two other men. The victim was kicked against his head.

label: shame
text: When I made acquaintance with the parents of my boyfriend for the first time. They spoke Limburgian (a dutch dialect) and one of my first remarks was that I disliked Limburgian dialect.

label: guilt
text: When I cancelled an appointment with an idle story. Afterwards it appeared that the person had looked forward to it and reserved time for it.

label: joy
text: For a few days I felt very miserable, distressed and listless, with crying fits. When this was over I felt very happy, although there was no special reason.

label: fear
text: I was testing my new roller skates in the street, suddenly a dog ran barking in my direction, very threatening. I was very startled and terribly upset.

label: anger
text: Out on a weekend with a group of people, everybody felt irritated because at night the music didn't stop in time. And at breakfast my boyfriend ran away because we didn't agree with him. I felt angry.

label: sadness
text: Recently I felt very sad without any reason. It lasted for a few days. There was nothing I liked in that period.

label: disgust
text: Someone told me a story of Amnesty International: a boy was killed and his head was put in the litter of his girlfriend. It looked as if she was pregnant, then she died. It is disgusting, I can hardly write it down.

label: shame
text: I cried for 3 hours because I felt very miserable. Then I called my boyfriend and he said lovely things to me. After this feeling disappeared I felt ashamed.

label: guilt
text: Yesterday my boyfriend and I wanted to play billiards. However there were boys playing (5 times). My boyfriend then is fed up and chagrined. In such case I think it is my fault.

label: joy
text: When my boyfriend and I experience something nice or when we have made a nice walk together.

label: fear
text: The weather is very bad (fog and slipperiness) the newcast reports many traffic accidents and my boyfriend is driving home and still has 60 kilometers to go.

label: anger
text: Someone told me that he would stay at my home for one night. Therefore I made big efforts to make everything ok (food). One day before he cancelled the appointment because he had to go to church with his parents.

label: sadness
text: We had to take our cat to the vet for mercy killing (an injection).

label: disgust
text: When people are eating unsavoury (smacking, belching, speaking with food in their mouth, etc.).

label: shame
text: A girl in our class was nicknamed \fatsy\". Later, I heard that she suffered from diabetes mellitus."

label: guilt
text: I made an appointment to pick up someone. However I arrived too late and she had to wait a quarter of an hour.

label: joy
text: One night I had a very good conversation with two friends. I then realized how worthy they were for me and how happy I was to have them as friends.

label: fear
text: In the morning just before going to the dentist.

label: anger
text: When a very close friend with whom I have a very intimate and bodily relationship (he had a girlfriend) started to avoid me and didn't want to talk to me any more.

label: sadness
text: When a good friend with whom I had an intimate relationship made clear that he didn't want to continue in the same way. He choose his girlfriend (also a friend of mine).

label: disgust
text: When I made love with someone who I didn't really love. Sometimes I even considered him unlikable.

label: shame
text: I had a short lasting sexual relationship with someone I didn't love.

label: guilt
text: When I realized that I avoided two good friends with whom I always shared toys and sorrows. I made up idle stories to avoid telling them what happened to me.

label: joy
text: My boyfriend suffered form ill health for some months, this week the physician told him that he was restored to health.

label: fear
text: When going out in the weekend I have to bike 5 kilometers through lonely and dark polders, then I always have terrifying fantasies.

label: anger
text: I made an appointment with a friend to drink coffee togehter. However, for the third time in that week she arrived an hour too late.

label: sadness
text: My dear hamster (called Hannes) died at the age of 2 and 1/2 years. His shape forced me to mercy killing (an injection).

label: disgust
text: I read a newspaper report that a little boy was forced to look while his sister was raped.

label: shame
text: We had made an appointment to complete together a piece of work. It appeared that I was the only one who hadn't prepared anything.

label: guilt
text: I call my mother at least once a week. However last week I completely forgot. This morning she called me, she thought I felt ill.

label: joy
text: After the funeral of an acquaintance I felt very depressed. That feeling turned into joy when I heard that I had achieved a good grade for an examination.

label: fear
text: I had to call someone and make an appointment for a conversation. I was very afraid to fail.

label: anger
text: When, after having cleaned up the kitchen, two hours later I saw that there was a big mess. It irritated me very much.

label: sadness
text: One night I was called and told that the father of a close friend died. When I visited my friend at home and when attending the funeral I felt very sad.

label: disgust
text: I cannot remember exactly such a situation. But I know that once I went to a very dirty lavatory and that disgusted me.

label: shame
text: Once by coincidence I clutched a stranger (in a rather intimate way), thinking it was my boyfriend. When by hindsight I feel ashamed when thinking about it.

label: guilt
text: I once torn the inner tube of a bike, that was not mine. Then I saw it was a brand new one. I felt very guilty then.

label: joy
text: When I found out that the girl, with whom I was in love, loved me too.

label: fear
text: When my mother threatened me with thrushing me of the stairs, when I once more should make a comment.

label: anger
text: When being made look a fool by the teacher in front of the class during a turn.

label: sadness
text: My mother unjustly became very angry with me and sent me to my room while my father explained that the way she saw things was not correct. I had done things with the best intentions.

label: disgust
text: My mother was very angry with my little sister and told her to put her hands on the table in order to beat her hands up. She forced by means of her power.

label: shame
text: A friend came for dinner with me at home. His parents are ordinary people. My mother, however, used the very expensive porcelain dinner-service and the silver cutlery. I felt very ashamed.

label: guilt
text: Once after falling in love, I imagined that particular girl to be perfect and completely overshadowing my girlfriend. Afterwards I realized that this image was not objective. I felt guilty against both girls.

label: joy
text: Once a week I work as a volunteer in a biologic garden. this work in the garden and the contact with other volunteers filled me with joy. They also gave me support after I failed passing my driver's test.

label: fear
text: My friend and I planned to search for old documents and utensils in the cellar. It was very late at night when we arrived in the cellar. He indicated the place where the police (40 years ago) found two dead bodies. I got very scared when he told me this story.

label: joy
text: When someone made me a compliment after an examination just at the moment I needed it. It was amicable, hearty and sincere.

label: fear
text: When I went up the stairs in a high, dark house full of shadows, passed a door and had the feeling that someone or something was behind me, although I knew I was alone.

label: anger
text: A friend told me it would be better for me not to be on familiar terms with another friend, although, in my opinion he had no reason to say such things. He only said so hoping that I would search support from him (that, however, was not necessary).

label: sadness
text: I had a good relationship with two friends. Once without reason, they clearly showed that they thought I was naive, dull and unable to take care for myself, while I expostulated that I could manage things.

label: disgust
text: When I see that some people remain cold and egoistic with regard to close friends, even in situations that those friends need them.

label: shame
text: When I state things with great positiveness and try to convince others, and it appears that my statement is not right.

label: guilt
text: A certain friend evokes positive feelings, when I am with him but negative feelings when he is not present. I feel the need to express those negative feelings. However, when I speak about him, I always think: Why do I like this, he does not deserve this, but still I do so.

label: joy
text: A few days ago, I hitch-hiked to Arnhems with a friend. Everything went well: they picked us up very quickly, the sun was shining, I was feeling free and, for the first time after long time, happy. I really had the feeling that I was living at full speed.

label: fear
text: My grandmother several times has been struck by cerebral hemorrhages. Until now she recovered well each time, but there is always the threat to loose her.

label: anger
text: I had made an appointment with three friends. We had to go out together. When I arrived at the place, the other persons weren't there. I became very angry because I thought they were gone without me. That, however, didn't appear to be the case.

label: sadness
text: I finished the relationship with my boyfriend, after having felt myself very unhappy for a long time.

label: disgust
text: A few days after I had finished the relationship with my boyfriend, we had a quarrel. Then he hit me. At that moment I found him disgusting.

label: shame
text: I was taking a shower in a cubicle in France. Then I discovered that a few children were loking at me from the adjacent cubicle.

label: guilt
text: I know that a certain person feels very lonely, and that she always looks forward to seeing me. However, often I am too busy to visit her, then I feel guilty.

label: joy
text: A close relative of mine underwent a difficult operation, and everything turned out fine.

label: fear
text: When I get into the tube or the train without paying for the ticket.

label: anger
text: A class-mate urged me to carry out a particular protest along with him, and when the time came this fellow drew back while I had to face the situation.

label: sadness
text: When I failed the entrance exam to IMEC.

label: disgust
text: When I saw someone eating live worms.

label: shame
text: When I was a child my parents caught me with a pornographic magazine.

label: joy
text: When they told me that I had got a study grant.

label: shame
text: When I wore a grotesque figure hanging down my back.

label: guilt
text: Because I had not studied.

label: joy
text: When my father was saved from a severe work accident.

label: fear
text: When I was a child I hid under the sheets out of fear of darkness.

label: anger
text: When I first saw a person begging.

label: sadness
text: When my basket ball team lost the qualification at a final.

label: disgust
text: When I see rotten meat.

label: shame
text: When a person whom I do not want to see is continously present.

label: guilt
text: When I failed an exam I thought I could pass easily.

label: joy
text: When I got to know that I had passed the university entrance exam.  I thought that I had done one of the exams badly.

label: fear
text: When I was very young, one day, I was in the street with my father and brother.   While my father was talking to some friends, I saw a dog and began to pat it.  My father told me sharply to stop doing it because the dog had mange.  Then my brother told me that I would die and I could not stop crying after this.

label: anger
text: We hitch hiked our way back from a town rather drunk.  We were dropped in another town which was unknown to us.  I needed to urinate, so I did it on a wall which turned out to belong to the military headquarters.  They arrested me and made me pay a fine of 500 pts.  We had to go home on foot (6 km) since it was too late for anyone to give us a lift.

label: sadness
text: I was to meet a girl in a discotheque.  She was very pretty and I was very happy.  But she did not turn up.  Thank God, there were some other friends there and I was able to have a more or less good time.

label: disgust
text: I had a class-mate who was rather stupid.  I did not like him but I respected him.  When he tried to talk to someone, they would not listen to him and I could not bear seeing this.

label: shame
text: I met a friend in a discotheque. he was with a girl and he told me that she was not his girlfriend.  I, to say something, commented that she must be a viscious woman.  He then told me that she was his girl.

label: guilt
text: I went to a pub with a group of friends (not very close) and I was with one girl most of the time, while the other girls in the group wanted to be with me.  They stopped talking to the girl I was with.

label: joy
text: The day some friends of mine and I decided to go to Galicia on holiday.

label: fear
text: Before an exam which I, finally did not take.

label: anger
text: At home when they lost three pieces of my puzzle.

label: sadness
text: When I had an argument with a friend.

label: disgust
text: When I am dirty because I have not had a shower for a few days.

label: shame
text: Once I did not have enough money to pay for a coffee.

label: guilt
text: After an argument with a friend of mine.

label: joy
text: A friend of mine told me that I had passed the entrance exam to the university.

label: fear
text: Before taking an exam.

label: anger
text: My family told me to leave if I was not willing to accept the conditions they imposed on me.

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine called me when I was not at home.  I phoned her back to know what she wanted and she told me that she had dialled the wrong number.

label: disgust
text: I had to change a baby's clothes for the first time.

label: shame
text: I fell outside the door of my house.

label: guilt
text: My younger sister was almost run over by a lorry.

label: joy
text: When my brother was born.

label: fear
text: When I almost fell down from some rocks because I had been acting foolishly and playing dangerously.

label: anger
text: Once I saw some children hunting a cat to death.

label: sadness
text: The death of a friend.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a scene on T.V where a castration was shown.

label: shame
text: Once I answered my father rudely.

label: guilt
text: When my brother ran away from home and I thought it was because of my continously scolding him.

label: joy
text: When I saw that I had passed the university entrance exam.  It made me forget all my problems.

label: fear
text: When I was ten I got shut in the school with a friend.  I had to jump out of a window and cross a beam 10 metres high.

label: anger
text: When I was told that a boy did not want to be my friend without any apparent reason.

label: sadness
text: When I learnt that a boy I liked had been with a girl for three years.

label: disgust
text: When a very dirty class-mate farted in my  presence.  There was a terrible smell.

label: shame
text: When I realized that I had a hole in my trousers after having gone for a walk.

label: guilt
text: When I had an argument with my grandfather the day my younger brother was born.

label: joy
text: When I saw my 16 year old sister at home after having waited for her all night, not knowing where she was.

label: fear
text: While I was waiting for them to give me the marks of the most difficult subject this year.

label: anger
text: I had an argument with my mother because I criticized the rules she imposes at home, which are too rigid and arbitrary for me.

label: sadness
text: When I learned that a friend of mine had not been speaking to her boyfriend for a week after an argument because of unfounded jealousy.

label: disgust
text: On seeing a scene of an accident in a magazine.

label: shame
text: A few days back I had to ask a professor a ridiculous question because I had lost at a game of cards and had to pay a forfeit.

label: guilt
text: When I shouted at my mother when she was nervous and depressed.

label: joy
text: After several days delay in my girlfriend's menstration I was very glad to see that the pregnancy test was negative.

label: fear
text: When I saw a TV program on the North American military plan called \The startwar\"."

label: anger
text: I felt angry when I saw on T.V the last slaughter of negroes in South Africa.

label: sadness
text: When I saw the pictures of the draught in Etiopia.

label: disgust
text: Whenever I see an alcoholic.

label: shame
text: On New Year's Eve, when I went to the house of my girlfriend's parents to meet them.

label: guilt
text: When I failed an exam for which I knew that I had not studied hard enough.

label: joy
text: The day the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the final at Athens.

label: fear
text: The last time I was face to face with with the monstrous dog which lives in my street.

label: anger
text: During a trivial (friendly) discussion, one of the participants made an intervention which made me feel uncomfortable.

label: sadness
text: When I heard the last regulation of the socialist govrenment concerning pensions.

label: disgust
text: When I got to know the details if the famine in East Africa.

label: shame
text: The last time I had to phone the Registry, after having called them so many times in the last few days.

label: guilt
text: During an argument with my brother, I behaved rather intransigently, even cruelly, wishing to morally hurt the \person\" opposed to me."

label: joy
text: When I passed an important exam.

label: fear
text: In a rather important exam, when they caught me red handed copying.

label: anger
text: When my father addressed me directly and maliciously, thus including me in the \family war\"."

label: sadness
text: When my parents got divorced.

label: disgust
text: When I was a child, one day while playing, I fell up to my waist in mud.

label: shame
text: When I was dismissed from a job after having been accused of theft.

label: guilt
text: When I was with a girl who seemed to love me, while I was with her just to go to bed with her.

label: joy
text: When I passed an exam which I had failed last year.

label: fear
text: When I go out alone at night.

label: anger
text: A murder.

label: sadness
text: When I failed two subjects last year.

label: disgust
text: When I see people who have no sentiments.

label: shame
text: I think that I am rather shy and do not mix with people as I would have liked to, out of shyness.

label: guilt
text: When I triffled with other people.

label: joy
text: When I was told that I could take a week off and go for a trip with my friends.

label: fear
text: Every time I went home with my school report.

label: anger
text: During an argument between friends, one of them accused me of taking advantage of some other friends who usually come to the university in my car, saying that I ask them too much money for the petrol.

label: sadness
text: When I learned that two of my friends had had a serious car accident.

label: disgust
text: A young man was insulting and humiliating a drunken man.

label: shame
text: My aunt phoned me to ask me why I had refused the her invitation to dinner at her home on the New Year's Eve.

label: guilt
text: I was with a girl one night and then did not call her again, although she had asked me to do so.

label: joy
text: When I saw that I had passed an exam.  It was the last chance and there was a lot at stake.

label: fear
text: On a trip to Santander we wanted to stop at a curve because a friend was sick, and the car skidded of the gravel.

label: anger
text: My cousins were playing at home and one of them broke a decorative object which was very precious to me.

label: sadness
text: All my friends arranged to go for an afternoon snack and they did not tell me.  They told me that they did not have my phone number but I do not think that this was true.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a film where a black was rapeing a girl while another one was filming it for a pornographic movie.

label: shame
text: I was swimming in the sea and a wave took the top part of my bikini away.

label: guilt
text: I was looking after a child and she fell down because I was not paying her much attention.  One side of her face got bruised.

label: joy
text: When I pass exams, or when a close friend of mine recovered from an illness,etc.

label: fear
text: Fights that I see in the middle of the street, robberies, fear of darkness when going home.

label: anger
text: During a family discussion on my future and my prospects as a student, they accused me of not bothering about looking for a job to assume my financial situation.

label: disgust
text: Some people whom I do not like at all, and one of the reasons is their physical appearance.

label: shame
text: For example, to feel bad because of one's attire, to be among people who do not belong to the same social class, to give a wrong answer in class, to be surprised in particular situations.

label: guilt
text: Some of my friends had an argument.  I had earlier phoned one of them and that may have influenced him to argue.

label: joy
text: When I met a very close friend of mine after one year of separation.

label: fear
text: There was an earthquake for several minutes and I was on the eight floor.

label: anger
text: An argument among several friends because of the irrational behavior of one of them who fell out with us for no reason and said that we were to blame.

label: sadness
text: A class-mate died after being two months in coma, after a car accident.

label: disgust
text: Pictures of Nazi extermination camps on a T.V program.

label: shame
text: Equivocal situation when filling a security questionnaire on entering a government building with several people there.

label: guilt
text: I left a boy with whom I was going around without giving him any explanations.

label: joy
text: When my sister was born.

label: fear
text: When they tried to rob me.

label: anger
text: When I failed an exam unfairly.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died.

label: disgust
text: When I see dead dogs on the road.

label: shame
text: When I went to see the doctor and had to take my clothes off so that he could examine me.

label: guilt
text: When my parents quarelled over something I had done and which was wrong.

label: joy
text: When my little sister was born.

label: fear
text: When I was attending an authorized demonstrationand the police rushed brutally at the demonstrators, without any warning.

label: anger
text: When a professor of this faculty laughed at, and was suspicious of a composition written by a class-mate and me.

label: sadness
text: The death of a relative, friend, or someone I esteem.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a very disagreable scene.

label: shame
text: When I had to represent my boss at a meeting.

label: guilt
text: When I inadvertantly made some close friends and relatives feel bad.

label: joy
text: When I passed an exam.

label: fear
text: When they threatened me with a knife to take my money.

label: anger
text: When I failed an exam I thought I would pass.

label: sadness
text: When my dog died.

label: disgust
text: When I saw an accident where the man lost his head.

label: shame
text: When I tripped while getting on a bus.

label: guilt
text: When I hurt a person's feelings.

label: joy
text: I had not seen my brother for five years as he was not in Spain.   When he arrived at the airport, I felt great joy.

label: fear
text: When two drug addicts tried to take away my money.

label: anger
text: When I saw my brother being attacked and I could not do anything.

label: sadness
text: When a class-mate died.

label: disgust
text: When a person saw that I was accused of something I had not done and did not do anything to defend me.

label: shame
text: When inadvertantly I found myself in the ladies room.

label: guilt
text: When I broke something and a friend of mine was blamed.

label: joy
text: I got my driving licence after they had frightened me with it's difficulty.

label: fear
text: When I had to walk over three kms through a field which had wild bulls, because my car had broken down.

label: anger
text: When I saw a man hitting a child of 2 years without any consideration, simply because the child had been leaning against a window.

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine who was driving a car ahead of me died in a car accident.

label: disgust
text: When I had to dissect a live mouse at school.

label: shame
text: When I was a child I had to recite a poem in a show at the end of the term.

label: guilt
text: When I saw a program on Ethiopia on T.V, a fews hours earlier I had thrown away some clothes and food.

label: joy
text: When I saw that the mark I had obtained in an exam was a good one.

label: fear
text: We were in the country and I walked away from the others one night.  Suddenly something moved sharply in front of me and I was not able to see what it was.

label: anger
text: When I was young, I became very angry as I was not allowed to stay up all night for the fair in my town.

label: sadness
text: When summer is over and I have to leave the town where I spend my holidays.

label: disgust
text: When I saw several people washing their car with water from a drain.

label: shame
text: When I inadvertantly entered the ladies room and met some girls on my way out.

label: guilt
text: I was entrusted with an object and while using it I handled it carelessly and it broke.

label: joy
text: When I learned, after the ecography, that my mother was expecting a baby girl.  That was what I wanted.

label: fear
text: One night, walking along a park, I began to think that some roughnecks would appear suddenly with knives and things like that.

label: anger
text: I had an exam and I had it well prepared.  I did the first part very well but did not know the second part.

label: sadness
text: When my parents did not let me go on a study tour.

label: disgust
text: One day I was going through the street door of my house, when a man asked me for a doctor.  He then showed me his genitals and asked me to cure him myself.

label: shame
text: Each time the professor asks me a question in class.

label: guilt
text: I had an argument with my boyfriend.  It was my fault but my pride would not let me admit it.

label: joy
text: An invitation to spend 5 days at the seaside with all expenses paid.

label: fear
text: A film on zombies.

label: anger
text: When males in my family try to assign house duties exclusively with referance to sex.

label: sadness
text: I had a quarrell with my boyfriend and decided to finish with him and and my Easter holidays.

label: disgust
text: When after a storm in the country, I left my shelter and saw a big, fat, slimy green toad by my side.

label: shame
text: When a friend from whom I preferred to hide my private life discovered that I had relations with a man.

label: guilt
text: When my brother had to spend all evening repairing a gear-lever that I had broken.

label: joy
text: When I passed the university entrance exam.

label: fear
text: When I was walking down the street, some boys showed me a knife and stole all my money.

label: anger
text: When they threw my holder down on the floor, with all my notes for an exam inside it and they got all mixed up.

label: sadness
text: When my mother was operated.

label: disgust
text: When I see pornographic films.

label: shame
text: One day I got on the bus without any money or season ticket and the driver threw me out.

label: guilt
text: When a friend of mine was beaten for what was my fault.

label: joy
text: My father had an operation which lasted for hours.  We were all very worried but it was successful.

label: fear
text: I was walking along a subway when I saw a group of louts.  I was rather afraid because I was alone.

label: anger
text: An old woman was violently thrown down the stairs of the tube by a group of louts.

label: sadness
text: A child, 9 years old, died in a stupid way.  He fell from a place which was 1 metre high.

label: disgust
text: On the road there was a dead animal with its entrails showing and its skull crushed.

label: shame
text: We were discussing a subject ( I knew very little about it) and I was holding my ground.  They showed me that I was wrong.

label: guilt
text: I could have passed the last exam of the public competition, but I failed as I had not studied.

label: joy
text: I was studying in the library and a class-mate told me that she had obtained a grant to work in the library.

label: fear
text: Before knowing my marks I was not sure that I wanted to go to that class.

label: anger
text: I learned that a class-mate had given a list, of peolpe who help each other in exams, to the professor.

label: sadness
text: I phoned two friends and was not able to arrange a meeting with either of them, so I had to change my plans.

label: disgust
text: I was in the cafeteria at the university and a class-mate told me that a friend of hers had had all her teeth taken out because of an infection caused by her eating a rat's nail in her hamburger.

label: shame
text: I had to meet a girlfriend to go out for a drink and she arrived with her aunt, to whom I was introduced.  Then the aunt left.

label: guilt
text: One night, after having decided to finish our relationship, I took my girlfriend home.  While driving back home, I felt that I had not handled the whole thing very well.

label: joy
text: The begining of my relations with my current girlfriend.

label: fear
text: When I am alone at night after having read horror stories, and then I heard unexplainable noises.

label: anger
text: A typical family argument.

label: sadness
text: The disqualification of two of my mates in the military service.

label: disgust
text: The sight of vomit on the street.

label: shame
text: When criticizing something about a person and then realizing that the person whom one is talking to is similar.

label: guilt
text: Not to have studied enough when exams were near.

label: joy
text: When I pass an exam.

label: fear
text: Continous fear of a nuclear war.

label: anger
text: When you kill yourself with work and see the number of slakers wandering around, doing nothing.

label: sadness
text: When someone in my family died.

label: disgust
text: To loose friends because of them over-estimating themselves.

label: shame
text: When people next to me play the fool.

label: guilt
text: To force someone to do something that suits me.

label: joy
text: I thought that I was going to fail a subject and so I began to study for the final exam, then my friend told me that I had passed it.  That meant that I could go home, as I do not study in my hometown.

label: fear
text: I was in Sierra Nevada, climbing a peak over 3,000 metres high, without any light and with many other problems.  I was afraid for my life.

label: anger
text: I was living in a flat where things did not go very well for me.  Finally, they threw me out and this prejudiced people I esteem a lot.

label: sadness
text: When I read the diary of the girl with whom I was living, it was about another boy with whom she had been going around some time back.

label: disgust
text: The man who threw me out of the flat disgusted me.

label: shame
text: The first time that I caressed a girl, I was about thirteen and she was eighteen.  I noticed that it did not affect her at all.

label: guilt
text: I was going around with a girl without loving her.  Not only did I go around with her, but we did many more things.  In the end I was not very sincere to her.

label: joy
text: I met a girlfriend again after not seeing her for several months.  I saw her in a discotheque.  We do not like discotheques but we went there because we knew we would meet there.

label: fear
text: I was walking in the countryside alone when I came across two dogs who began barking at me.  I did not know whether they were tied up or loose, but I was afraid of them approaching me.

label: anger
text: I was angry when my sister began to talk nonsense and to laugh at the way I swept the room.  My anger grew (I tried to control myself).  After telling her to leave me alone, I vented my anger on her as she did not obey me.

label: sadness
text: My mother was working with a knife and we were all laughing heartily.  She was not able to control the knife and stuck it deep into her hand.

label: disgust
text: I read a book whose plot and expressions were obscene and in very bad taste.

label: shame
text: My mother had just been teaching me how to crochet, which is thought highly improper for a boy in a town.  Just when we finished, a neighbour walked in.

label: guilt
text: It was about midnight and I wanted to go to the countryside (I was in town) to watch the stars in the sky.  My mother did not like this, in spite of it I went out for a while.  My mother got angry.

label: joy
text: A friend of mine suggested that I become a film extra.  The idea seemed very funny to me and my reaction seemed rather outlandish to the others.

label: fear
text: One day I went to the cinema to see a film in which I was interested.  On arriving there I saw a long queue (which I had not expected) and went back home without seeing the film.

label: anger
text: When I miss the train and I am late, and I have to wait half an hour for the next one.

label: sadness
text: When I knew I had to go out with my mother on some errands.

label: disgust
text: I saw in an ice-cream kiosque a cockroach walking through a cornet.

label: shame
text: One day in class, the professor asked me a question concerning something he had been explaining.  He was very close to me (beside me) and I had no idea what to answer.

label: guilt
text: Once I had some homework to do and I did not do it.

label: joy
text: When they phoned me from Great-Britain to tell me that I could go there, if I wished, in Summer.

label: fear
text: When I was operated on the knee and had to go through rehabilitation.

label: anger
text: In a very important basket-ball match where a lot was at stake, I played very badly.

label: sadness
text: When a friend of mine told me that he was going to commit suicide.

label: disgust
text: A TV program on whale-hunting.

label: shame
text: Once when I said bad things concerning a friend.

label: guilt
text: Family discord and uneasiness due to something I did not communicate on time.

label: joy
text: When I passed my driving test, as it was the fifth time that I had taken this test.

label: fear
text: When my mother was robbed in a shop.

label: anger
text: I was given an exam which I thought did not measure at all my ability or my knowledge of the subject.

label: sadness
text: When I saw the film \Johnny got his gun\" which deals with the consequences of the Vietnam war."

label: disgust
text: Some friends and I were having lunch.  Someone said something funny and one of the guys started laughing and spat his food in a girl's face.

label: shame
text: I was alone in the bus when I tripped and fell, and dropped all my papers.

label: guilt
text: As I was not paying attention, my little brother fell off the table.

label: joy
text: When I passed the university entrance exam.

label: fear
text: One night, while I was sleeping, I woke up suddenly with the sensation that there was someone in my room.

label: anger
text: When my brother was held up and robbed.

label: sadness
text: When they told me that my grandfather was rather ill.

label: disgust
text: When I see someone vomitting.

label: shame
text: When I fell head on in a fountain.

label: guilt
text: I had to undergo an operation in Summer and so my family had to stay at home during the holidays.  I felt guilty, above all because of my brothers.

label: joy
text: I came across a friend with whom I had lost touch for a long time.

label: fear
text: I had decided to propose to the man I liked to make a trip together.  One day, during breakfast I told him my idea.  I was afraid of his not accepting it and that the idea would end up as a failure.

label: anger
text: A person I trusted a lot gave me many false explanations to justify a wrong action.

label: sadness
text: I was having breakfast with a classmate and suddenly I began to cry as I thought of a friend of mine whom I had not seen for a long time.

label: disgust
text: During lunch with some classmates, a priest was also there.  He was eating desperately as if someone was going to take his plate away.  He did it with gluttony.  He wiped his hands on his suit several times and it was full of crumbs.

label: shame
text: When a professor caught me absent-minded and not paying attention to what he was saying.

label: guilt
text: One day, I was alone on duty when a patient choked while eating.  I ran to her and tried to make her breath, but it was too late.

label: joy
text: At a party, on New Year's Eve, I met on old friend whom I had not seen for some time

label: fear
text: Once I failed seven subjects at school and I was terrified to give my report card to my father.  I left it on the table and went to bed very early in order to avoid him seeing me.

label: anger
text: When, after drinking a glass of water, I found a cockroach walking out of the glass.

label: sadness
text: I have a very close friend who lives in another city and we have been writing to each other for a long time.  The last time I went to her city, just to see her, I was disappointed to see how great the distance between us was.

label: disgust
text: They asked me to throw the rubbish into a dustbin which had some awful liquid accumulated at the bottom.

label: shame
text: The girl with whom I was going around had been forbidden to be alone with me in the house.  We paid no attention to this prohibition but one day her parents appeared and I jumped out of the window.  They saw me.

label: guilt
text: I was driving a friend's car, and I got close to the pavement to ask my way and I struck a parked car.

label: joy
text: Every time, in the last few days, when my girlfriend told me that she loves me.

label: fear
text: I stayed alone in the dark at night in the mountain, waiting for my uncle.  I remember that I took a big stone and it calmed me.

label: anger
text: We were at school, in the room for audiovisual classes.  We were watching a film, and just behind me two classmates were bothering me with their mocking and shoves.  I reacted angrily (I suppose)  by hitting one of them.

label: disgust
text: Once I had to clean a lavatory which was obstructed.  It was in a friend's country house and there was nobody there to help me.

label: shame
text: In a Mathematics class, the professor asked me a question and I gave the wrong answer.

label: guilt
text: When I lost my study grant without having attended any exam in the career I had started, and it was too late to cancel my registration.

label: joy
text: A party I went to last Christmas.

label: fear
text: When my mother had a nervous illness.

label: anger
text: During my last exam.

label: sadness
text: When I had to come back from my village last Christmas.

label: disgust
text: One day I went to see a rather disagreeable film (X).

label: shame
text: Once I had to visit a rather special person.

label: guilt
text: Once, I accidentally injured a boy in the eye and he almost lost it.

label: joy
text: When I knew the feelings of a beloved person.

label: fear
text: A fall during a climb, with almost with no previous experience.

label: anger
text: On the occasion of assignment of tasks and responsibilities in which such an assignment, dispropotionately carried with it high responsibility and low ability of organisation and resolution.

label: sadness
text: Moving to an unknown place, away from the familiar surroundings and into a situation of loneliness.

label: disgust
text: When I had to sleep in a bed at a hostel, which was full of dirt.

label: shame
text: While shopping, a person close to us created an uncomfortable situation for those who were with her.

label: guilt
text: Incomprehension and repression towards a child's behaviour, commonly not accepted, and making the child cry.

label: fear
text: In a dark street at 4 o'clock in the night and there was complete silence.

label: anger
text: When they broke the artistic work of several weeks.  Changes were made and it was broken without permission, they had no right to do this.

label: sadness
text: When the train taking me to my military service left the station, on the platform remained relatives, projects and goodtimes.  I had a hard year ahead.

label: disgust
text: A situation of overt unfairness, manipulation of people and its consequences.

label: shame
text: A children's film in which I played a clown, with spotlights, cameras and the director who demanded jumps and guffaws.

label: guilt
text: When a close classmate failed a year.

label: joy
text: I was talking to a friend and he said something which was very funny.

label: fear
text: When I was young I saw a horror film.  Then when I went to sleep, the film came back too my mind and the characters frighteneed my imagination.

label: anger
text: In a confrontation with a person, he provoked me several times till I reacted in an angry way.  Fortunately there were no disastrous consequences.

label: sadness
text: I was watching a sad film and it affected me deeply.

label: disgust
text: When I was reading a book.  It had nothing to do with the book itself but with the disagreable smell of the pages of the book.

label: shame
text: In class I had to say something aloud and people reacted  by laughing.

label: guilt
text: In an exam I answered the questions rather carelessly and afterwards I thought that the exam would have been better had I answered more carefully.

label: joy
text: When I knew that there were, at last, no problems in making a journey that I had been wanting to make for a long time.

label: fear
text: It was more that fear - anguish -that I felt before my last exam.

label: anger
text: When I had an argument with my best friend and I thought that I was right and she was not.

label: sadness
text: When I realized that it was impossible for me to be as free as I had imagined and that I could not do anythong about it.

label: disgust
text: The first time I saw a pornographic film, all that in practice is so beautiful but on the screen appered as something mechanical, irrational, disgusting and dehumanizing.

label: shame
text: When I stated sharply something I was not very sure of and a few days later I was shown to be wrong.

label: guilt
text: When I do or say something inappropriate which hurts people close to me.

label: joy
text: When a study tour got confirmed, I was happy all the time till    the tour began.

label: fear
text: I was walking down a road and suddenly a few dogs appeared at a fence and started barking angrily.  They were jumping and it seemed that they would come for me any time.

label: anger
text: When I knew that they would not give me a transfer from one university to another.  I began to insult the educatioon authorities and the government, I ended up at the door.

label: sadness
text: We went to visit my mother at the residence.  She was crying and said that she was about to die.  I believed all her complaints and continously thought of the possibility of loosing her.

label: disgust
text: My dog had been run over and died near the house.  We had to pick him up, cold and glassy eyed, to get rid of the corpse.

label: shame
text: A professor was going to read aloud in class a composition of mine in which I had criticized some political attitudes and also some class-mates.   I was ashamed at having written that.

label: guilt
text: In an exam when I answered the questions with very little assurance due to insufficiet preparation.

label: joy
text: When I received my report card in C.O.U.  I was afraid of obtaining low marks, but they were much higher than expected.

label: fear
text: I was at the cinema with my sister and her boyfriend.  A man sitting beside me started to stroke my leg for a while, he left in the middle of the film.

label: anger
text: My father began to say incoherant things concerning my brother's and my own behaviour towards him.  His biased (authoritarian) and ridiculous point of view made us angry.

label: sadness
text: I had failed some subjects in mathematics.

label: disgust
text: I was at the table at a French friend's house.  They served me a big dish with roast cauliflower and sauce.  I had to eat it.

label: shame
text: This morning I spent a lot of time on my toilet and missed the train to the university.  My mother told me that I spent more time than a woman on my toilet.  I felt a mixed emotion of shame and anger.

label: guilt
text: I was alone at home when I broke a figure and then mended it.  A few days later my mother noticed it and asked me about it, I told her that I had no idea.

label: joy
text: When I fell crazily in love with a beautiful girl and she returned my love.

label: fear
text: When I was caught by the police and was kept with a group of delinquents, which added to my fear of being shut up.  I was afraid of the people near me and the future consequences.

label: anger
text: When I was the target of a great many insults and completely unfair accusations of a large group of people.

label: sadness
text: When my best friend died, at the age of 16.

label: disgust
text: When I entered a brothel and saw two sailors with a young prostitute who was not older than 18.

label: shame
text: When I was in a religious school my teacher showed me up in front of all my class-mates.  They were very sarcastic and cruel.

label: guilt
text: Having suffered a not very pretty sight, I reacted by uttering some very cruel and sharp words.

label: joy
text: When I came across an old friend whom I had not seen for a very long time.

label: fear
text: I had an accident in which I hurt my eye.  I was afraid of having injured it badly.

label: anger
text: When I was accused of something I had not done.

label: sadness
text: A close friend died.

label: disgust
text: I saw some images of a decapitation in a horror film.

label: shame
text: I slipped and fell in to a puddle and people started looking at me.

label: guilt
text: I made another person cry for an unjustified cause.

label: joy
text: I received an unexpected letter from a friend I had met a short time before.  He sent me a poem and wished me good luck.  I felt very happy because I had great esteem for that person.

label: fear
text: I was walking with another person when a \gang\" separted us and pushed me in to a house, hit me in the stomach and the face, then they left - leaving me bleeding."

label: anger
text: A certain person started to say dreadful things very calmly, I felt hurt and disgusted.

label: sadness
text: A certain person whom I respect and esteem a lot pays me no attention.  She keeps up appearances but shows almost no interest in me.

label: disgust
text: In a bus I fell sick and vomitted in a bag.  The entire situation was disgusting in itself.

label: shame
text: A person (a male) told me that he liked me.  He has a problem, he is a homosexual.

label: guilt
text: I rejected a person whom I had always thought to be a friend.  I told him so and he reacted angrily.  I felt guilty at not having realized it before and at having hurt him.

label: joy
text: When I received some good news : I obtained an amount of money I needed to buy something I had been planning to buy.

label: fear
text: When my relatives and I were in a car going slowly on a frozen road.

label: anger
text: My parents were having a typical family argument.  I came in and saw the scene and became angry.

label: sadness
text: I was going away, leaving a dear person behind.

label: disgust
text: I visited a place in Morocco where they worked the leather.  I saw the skins emerged in a liquid which ressembled putrification.

label: shame
text: At a friend's party there were several allusions to my sexual adventures.

label: guilt
text: I was in a cafe with another person when, suddenly, several close friends of my partner appeared.  I did not know what to do and my partner felt uncomfortable.

label: joy
text: When I talk to my friends.

label: fear
text: When I am walking on the streets and see a gang of thugs.

label: anger
text: When people harrass me I feel oppressed by their behavior.

label: sadness
text: When I am with a friend and we have to leave each other.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a film in which the man suffered from an illness and    his skin came peeling off.

label: shame
text: When I was in the toilet and someone came in.

label: fear
text: On a dark night I felt that there were several people near me and I did not know who they were.

label: anger
text: When I learned that several people had died in the street due to  the cold weather.

label: sadness
text: When I saw in the newspapers, on the T.V, and magazines the chaotic situation caused by the drought and hunger in Mauritania.

label: disgust
text: The physical appearance of a meal.

label: shame
text: I was with a group of people and everybody told me to do or say something.  It was a confusing, strong and traumatic situation for me.

label: guilt
text: In a situation with my girlfriend I took a decision.  Later when I thought about it, I realized that it was an erroneous decision.

label: joy
text: One night, at a friend's place I realized that I had everything I most wished, around me.

label: fear
text: During a demonstration I climbed up the closed central door of a bus.  When the bus stopped I had to go back to the same place, afraid that the police would see me.

label: anger
text: When I saw parents punishing their little child for something he had not done.  In my opinion, even if he had done it he should not have been punished for it.

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine was hurt as he thought that our relationship was not the same as before and something had gone wrong.

label: disgust
text: When I was young, one day in the car we fell sick and ended up vomitting on each other.

label: shame
text: The parents of a friend of mine surprised us and another couple sleeping in thier place.

label: guilt
text: A friend of mine felt bad because of something I had done to something that belonged to him.

label: joy
text: When they told me that I had been admitted to the faculty of medicine.

label: fear
