text: When I went to report a stolen good at the police station, the woman-officer-in-charge was very rude and did not seem to have respect for anyone.

label: shame
text: I insulted two of my friends because I thought that had been gossiping about me right under my nose, however I later found out that they were not doing so.

label: guilt
text: I failed to keep a promise and this had a serious effet on someone's problem.

label: joy
text: When I met my mother after not having seen her for three years.

label: fear
text: When my neighbour's life was threatened by someone who was trying to break into his house.

label: anger
text: When a boy who was drunk came into my room and misbehaved in the presence of my boyfriend.

label: sadness
text: My father resigned from work, and soon after this his elder brother died.  The next day my granny died (my mother's mother).  My dad remains the only living member of his family.

label: disgust
text: When the committee, to which I belong, was accused of having squandered the money of the association.

label: shame
text: When I went to the library three weeks after it had opened and found that everyone was busy.

label: guilt
text: When my friend was punished for something that I had done.

label: joy
text: For my parents anniversary, we hosted a party and we were very happy.

label: fear
text: One evening when my sisters, brothers and I were watching T.V my kid brother took a big mirror and reflected light on the french windows.  I thought that these lights that we could see were coming from torches annd that it meant that there were thieves outside.

label: anger
text: Some people were sitting outside and saying things which were not really true.

label: sadness
text: A break-up with someone I really liked.

label: disgust
text: I came across a woman in town who was very drunk.  She was swearing at everyone and carried on drinking even though she could hardly stand.

label: shame
text: I was wearing a slit tight dress at a disco and it burst open.

label: guilt
text: I had stopped talking to a very close friend of mine.  A week later he came over to try and make friends with me  again and from the way he talked I felt that he was a very mean preson.

label: joy
text: When I accepted Jesus Christ as my personal saviour.

label: fear
text: When I witnessed a bus accident in which a bus, full of passengers,  nearly overturned on the Lusaka-Kabwe road.á

label: anger
text: When my sister came home late one day and thus disobeyed my parents.

label: sadness
text: When I heard the news of my grandfather's sudden death.

label: disgust
text: When I failed the  grade 7 exams.

label: shame
text: When my younger sister, who was then 16 years old, was pregnant.

label: guilt
text: When I hurt my sisters for no reason at all.

label: joy
text: When I attended my cousin's 31st birthday.

label: fear
text: I got a very nasty electrical shock when I was tampering with some electrical applainces.á

label: anger
text: When I was subjected to a very nasty joke by a group of friends.

label: sadness
text: When I received my results and found out that I could not go to a school of my choice.

label: disgust
text: When I found a maggot in my food at the dinning hall, all the food had gone bad.

label: shame
text: I took a girl out once and discovered that she was going around with one of my close friends.

label: guilt
text: An item which belonged to a friend of mine was missing.  I had taken it earlier and I thought that I had returnrd it so when he asked me for it I stubbornly refused having it.  Later when I looked for it, I found it in my room.

label: joy
text: When I got my results ( I had made it to the second year ).

label: fear
text: When I thought that I had failed the examination.

label: anger
text: When I discovered that my girlfriend was going around with another boy.

label: sadness
text: When my grandfather died.

label: disgust
text: When I heard that my sister had shouted at my friend's cousin at their place.

label: shame
text: When I failed the grade 7.

label: guilt
text: When I had lied, saying that I never take bread from the dinning hall and a friend of mine caught me doing it.  He thus proved to me that I did in fact take the bread.

label: joy
text: When my girl told me that she loved me more than any male creature on earth and that I would be the only one in her heart for all her life.

label: fear
text: The day I was nearly stabbed to death by ruffians who wanted to take my money.  I refused to give them any money and they started running after me, I ran into somebody else's house to save myself.

label: anger
text: When a kid dropped my father's radio cassette player, which he had just repaired.

label: sadness
text: When someone I love told me that she did not love me anymore and that she wanted all the snaps that she had given me in exchange for the ones I had given her.

label: disgust
text: When a girl said in my back that we were in love, and she had actually refused me.  When I confronted her she started insulting me.

label: shame
text: When I told a lie to a friend of my sister on April fool's day.  She later came to see me and told me that it was a very foolish thing to do.

label: guilt
text: A girl dropped some stuff from her bag and when I tried to help her I realized that she had used me and I was made to look like a fool.

label: joy
text: When I learnt that I had been accepted at UNZA.

label: fear
text: When thieves broke into my house at night and held my wife and me on gun-point for at least ten minutes and took away a lot of property.

label: anger
text: When I was beaten up by thieves on behalf of some friends of mine as they thought that I had a lot of money and would not part with a few coins for their drinks.

label: sadness
text: When I received the news that my in-laws had passed away.  I depended heavily on them for their guidance and the running of their daughter's buisness.

label: disgust
text: When my younger sister visited me during the school holidays and told me that she would not go back to school because she was pregnant.

label: shame
text: When I lied to my wife and told her that I was going to the Copperbelt on a buisness trip, she later found me in a hotel with a girlfriend.

label: guilt
text: When I cheated my father and told him that the school administration wanted K80 for the purchase of a mini-bus.  Two months later the school authorities wrote back to my father for the money.  I could not go back and ask him for the money again as he had already given it to me once.

label: joy
text: When I received the acceptance letter from UNZA.  I had just come home from work when my kind sister handed me an enveloppe which I opened and was overcome with joy.

label: fear
text: I was at home and we were sleeping when we heard some robbers breaking into our house.

label: anger
text: A certain boy came into my room and started telling me that I was not pretty, that I had no manners and that I should learn some.  I had just come to campus and he was in fourth year.

label: sadness
text: My elder sister whom I love very much was leaving for the          West Indies for two years and I was staying behind.

label: disgust
text: A certain girl asked me what my major was and when I told her that it was P.A she started criticizing it saying, \I hate that course.\"  She just shows off in front of other people."

label: shame
text: I took an exam which I failed terribly as I had not studied.

label: guilt
text: I told my elder brother that he was irresponsible and that I did not care for what he did because he was teasing me.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to this university despite my having studyied in difficulty throughout my secondary school days.

label: shame
text: The day I learnt that my girlfriend had been going around with  a close friend of mine.

label: guilt
text: I was drunk one night and I insulted three ladies.  The following morning they approached me and asked me the reason behind my bahaviour, I apologized for my unruly behaviour.

label: joy
text: I felt happy when I learnt that I had qualified for the grade eight.

label: fear
text: I was afraid when I learnt that my father was seriously ill in hospital.

label: anger
text: When I met my new girlfriend with another man in the street.

label: sadness
text: When I learnt that my brother-in-law had been poisoned by his friends and that he was dead.

label: disgust
text: When I found out that the seat in the coach that I had booked had been sold to somebody else.

label: shame
text: When money was stolen from my pocket.

label: guilt
text: When I discovered that the girl I was courting was a relative of mine.

label: joy
text: My son passed grade 7 and was accepted for form I.

label: fear
text: When the robbers broke in, at night.

label: anger
text: I wrote an assignment and was given less marks than a friend with whom I had previously discussed the assignment.

label: sadness
text: When I got a message that my child was not feeling well.

label: disgust
text: When I was teaching a student started making silly remarks in class.

label: shame
text: When I was in grade one, one day I felt like going to the toilet during class but I was very scared of the teacher so I urinated in the class.

label: guilt
text: I bought something and the shopkeeper gave me more change, I realized this after I had left the shop and was on the bus-stop - and I then needed the money.

label: joy
text: When I received the acceptance form for the second year at university.

label: fear
text: The day my parents were involved in a car accident and had to be operated  and before the operation the doctor said that it was mater of life or death.

label: anger
text: I got into an argument with a photographer for whom I had to pose twelve times, over  a period of four weeks, before I could get a snap of mine.  Every time the film was processed my snap did not come out although the others did.

label: sadness
text: I was sad at the expulsion of some of my comrades during the UNZA demonstrations.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted at the way the bus conductor threw out an old woman oiut of the mini-bus simply because she could not pay the fare for her luggage.

label: shame
text: I had a feeling of shame when I found myself unable to answer some questions from my tutor simply because of a lack of preparation.

label: fear
text: This last August when my parents dropped me off and moved me into college I didn't know anybody here; I was 17 and Berkeley really scared me.

label: anger
text: When I found my boyfriend, who I had been dating for a year, at another girl's house. We had had previous conflicts concerning the girl, but he had always claimed they were just friends.

label: sadness
text: The same as for SHAME and DISGUST. I was asked to resign my sorority which I did because I was ashamed.

label: disgust
text: The same as in SHAME.

label: shame
text: On a road trip with a group of sorority and fraternity people, I became intoxicated and basically raped. I don't remember the actual event, but I know the feeling that I experienced later.

label: guilt
text: When I got fired from a job because I gave a discount to a friend.

label: joy
text: Our basketball team is undefeated in league play (4-0) currently.

label: fear
text: Whenever I think of enrolling in Organic Chemistry.

label: anger
text: I saw in a movie a block on which affluence and poverty existed. I saw that the rich made no attempts to help the poor.

label: sadness
text: When I felt powerless to help the poor or when I don't know how to.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted at my teams poor perfomance prior to league play.

label: joy
text: I received a grade above average on a midterm (chemistry) and I expected onevery below average.

label: fear
text: I was walking home from a place on southside and I live on Northside and I was followed. I headed my most direct route.

label: anger
text: Someone signed up for a workshift at the co-op where I live and she did not want to work the switchboard. I became very angry. She had mentioned earlier that she wanted and needed the workshift to me so I did not sign up.

label: sadness
text: I did not do as well as I expected on a chemistry exam. I received a score below the average and I thought I had done very well.

label: disgust
text: I saw someone that I thought I knew repeatedly drunk. I do not like to be around alcoholics.

label: shame
text: Every time I was around this one person I would stick my foot in my mouth by being nasty. One time I accidently said something fairly cruel that was totally inappropriate.

label: guilt
text: I blew up at someone for being confused and because of his irresponsibility and afterwards I felt guilty and that I had no right.

label: joy
text: Right before I went to a concert with my last boyfriend he told me that although he told me he was going to take me to the concert, he didn't want to see me anymore. After that we stayed overnight and I said \well, when he leaves me I will be ruined for awhile, but for now we're together.\" I woke up in his arms and it was the happiest moment of my life."

label: fear
text: I was river rafting in Nev. and our boat tipped over and I was sucked under in to some rocks and got stuck and all I could think was that I was going to die. And it was so quiet under the water it seemed like no one would care or remember.

label: anger
text: One of my first boyfriends got mad at me because a lot of my close friends were guys and he didn't want me to see them anymore because he was jealous.

label: sadness
text: I was watching a sunset after my latest boyfriend left me and I realized that we would never watch sunsets again, probaly never see eachother again and none of it mattered.

label: disgust
text: I was listening to a priest in church saying how sinful man was, and how all men should renounce their desires and pleasures to please God. I could never understand how something that brings you joy could be a sin.

label: shame
text: My third grade teacher caught me cheating on a spelling test. I couldn't spell Australia and she said in a loud voice something like \We don't have cheaters in my class\"."

label: guilt
text: When I was 5, a few of my friends and I would light matches for fun. One of my friends confessed to her parents and my parents, I guess, knew or suspected I was involved but I said I knew nothing about it.

label: joy
text: I felt extreme joy the day I was baptized. I was one with God.

label: fear
text: I felt fear when my friend and I broke into an abandoned military base in Los Angeles this summer. I feared because I didn't want to be caught.

label: anger
text: I experienced anger most recently when I had committed a sin which I had gone a week and a half without doing. I had made a vow to God and had blown it. Now I had to start all over.

label: sadness
text: I last really felt sad when I left home for I was leaving all my long time, pre-kindergarten relationships behind.

label: disgust
text: When I committed a sin mentioned in ANGER. A sin of sexual immorality.

label: shame
text: When I just took a shower with a girl down the hall. I felt that I had let my devotion to God go out the window. Although nothig happened I felt ashamed.

label: guilt
text: When I committed the sin of immorality mentioned before.

label: joy
text: Finally being asked by someone to a banquet.

label: anger
text: A few weeks back, as I was in a hurry to leave the house, I left some of my things lying around.  This is something I never do. My uncle,who lives with us, as we live in a joint family, remarked that we were always doing things like  this.  This really got me mad.

label: sadness
text: When I took the B.A exams,I was expecting a 1st class even though I had not done very well. When the results came out I felt sad as I had missed the 1st class by 12 marks.

label: disgust
text: A girlfriend of mine behaves in a very childish way - she does not like my going to see a friend who has been introduced to me by this same friend of mine.  I would like to be friends with both of them, but she does not like this as she is possessive and would like me to be close only to her.

label: shame
text: A friend of mine had said something about not liking to come to my place just before coming to my place.   In the meanwhile I got to learn about this from another friend of mine and when she arrived at my place I really treated her badly.  I was later ashamed of the way I had treated someone when the person was at my place.

label: guilt
text: A few days back my mother was not feeling too well and still did all the house work.  I felt guilty as I had not offered to help.

label: joy
text: When I passed the B.A exams and my parents allowed me to carry on my studies and do a M.A. , I was very happy.

label: fear
text: I was scared of water when I was a child.

label: anger
text: When I get home late my father scolds me and this makes me angry.

label: sadness
text: When my aunt died.

label: disgust
text: A friend of mine remembered me when she needed me and did not even think about me when she did not need me.

label: shame
text: When I got 1 mark in an Abnormal Psychology exam.

label: joy
text: When I passed the B.A exams with 1st class.  I was the first in the family to have got a 1st class, so all the family members were very happy and they gave me the opportunity to study further.

label: fear
text: When I dreamt that my family was in trouble and was facing many difficulties.

label: anger
text: When my brother got very low marks in the exams, I was very angry. I put my studies aside to help him, as every time my brother does  badly at school, my family members blame me as well.á

label: shame
text: During a class I was asked a question which I did not hear very clearly, so I gave an answer which was not related to the question and everyone started laughing at me.

label: guilt
text: When my pet dog,who was to us a family member, died.  He had been vomitting for the past three days and we had not found the time to call a vet, finally when the vet came it was already too late.

label: joy
text: When last year in college I received the award \Best Student of the Year\",   I felt very happy as I got what I had wanted and my wish had been fulfilled.1"

label: fear
text: Once I woke up in the middle of the night and felt frightened as everyone else was sleeping and I could not even go to their room.

label: disgust
text: At work when I did not get the full co-operation of my colleagues to complete an assignment.

label: guilt
text: In the begining of teenage, on the matters of sex - speaking about sex.

label: joy
text: In 1980 when I was in the 12th standard, we had arranged a small picnic in Kandala.  One of my closest friends wrote a small and cute poem for me, which expressed the feeling of closeness we had for each other.  I was very thrilled and I can still remember it.

label: fear
text: Once I was caught by thugs aged between 20-35, they asked me to surrender all the property I had and I remember feeling very scared.

label: anger
text: One night we, all the family members, were sitting in the front corridor of the house when a gentleman looking person came in.  He was my father's client and he had come to bribe my father in connection with the proceeding case.  At my father's refusal he abused my father, my brother and I could not control our temper and we rushed at him.

label: sadness
text: Once my friend and I got into into a hot discussion on a very controversial topic.  At one point of the argument I disagreed with her totally and I took what she was saying as an insult.  So I couter-argued and unknowingly hurt her emotionally, I felt very sad about this.

label: disgust
text: After joining my M.A in Social Sciences, I appeared for the first semester exam.  I failed one of the exams, and when I looked at my results I felt disgusted and then I got angry.

label: joy
text: I met my friend and he gave me a wonderful present as it was my birthday.  I enjoyed having that present.

label: fear
text: When I lost a wallet while travelling, since it belonged to the group I was very afraid.

label: anger
text: When a person whom I had invited did not come on the appointed day and time.

label: sadness
text: I tried my level best to care for my client, I took an appointment with a doctor and before meeting the doctor he expired - a poor small boy from Uttar Pradesh.

label: disgust
text: My notes were not returned to me, it kept on being procrastinated.

label: shame
text: I was misbehaving in the agency.

label: guilt
text: A friend of mine got encouragement and I did not, as the supervisor did not like me.

label: joy
text: When I got the scholarship letter from Australia.

label: fear
text: When going to the exam.

label: sadness
text: When my brother's visa for the U.S.A got cancelled.

label: guilt
text: I had known the girl for a few months when I proposed to her and this put an end to our friendship, as from then on we started withdrawing from each other.  I liked her very much.

label: joy
text: When my elder sister had a baby girl.  She was the first girl in the family after 19 years of baby boys.

label: fear
text: When our school was raided by the pupils of the boys secondary school who beat us up.

label: anger
text: When my room-mate locked up the keys of my room in our room after I had told her that I was  only in the bathroom having a shower.  She left and I had to do without supper.

label: sadness
text: When I received the news that my beloved grandmother had died.  I was at the boarding school and was only 13 years old.

label: disgust
text: One evening when a boy who was drunk made a pass at me by trying to kiss me.

label: shame
text: When I blurted out an answer in class without having been asked to do so.  The teacher told me that it was bad manners to do so.

label: guilt
text: When I had promised to do some washing for my mother and I did not do it.  She did it herself despite her being ill.  I felt very guilty.

label: joy
text: I was very happy when I passed and went to form I.  It was a great relief for me as I had been very worried considering the large number of pupils who fail.

label: fear
text: During the last academic year i.e 1983/1984 just before the closure, we were surrounded and threatened by the paramilitary forces.

label: anger
text: When someone I trusted very much, disappointed me.

label: sadness
text: When a close friend of mine who was with me in first year could not make it to the second year.

label: disgust
text: When one of my friends started misbehaving.

label: shame
text: When I failed one of the tests because I had not worked hard enough.

label: guilt
text: When I was scolded by my dad for bad behaviour.

label: joy
text: After waiting impatiently for the results of the form 5 examinations for almost a year, at last I received a letter of acceptance from the Senate of the university of Zambia telling me that I had made it to the first year course at UNZA.

label: fear
text: The first day that I was close to a dead body, in my third year at UNZA, school of medicine.

label: anger
text: A few monthe ago, when my brother's wife told me that I had bad manners.  To make matters worse she did not let me use their telephone as she only allowed people of her own tribe.

label: sadness
text: When I got to know that my father had passed away.

label: disgust
text: I was disgusted to discover that my girlfriend of few weeks was already fooling around with another guy.  I was disappointed as the guy was a rogue and I respected my girlfriend.

label: shame
text: I was saying bad things about a man I had never seen.  I was with a friend and did not know that she was related to this man.  My friend did not tell me about it and I discovered this myself.

label: guilt
text: A very, very close friend of mine used to come to my room to      see me and I naver bothered to pay him a visit.  One day he asked me the reason behind this and I gave him a shirt.

label: joy
text: When I received the first year results as the first year had involved a lot of work and I was very pleased when I got the results.

label: fear
text: When mother was very ill, I feared that she would die.

label: anger
text: When a boy, who was drunk, insulted me in front of a crowd.  I was stopped from punching him for it.

label: sadness
text: When I heard the news that my brother had passed away.  It was the first time that I lost a brother.

label: disgust
text: When a student accused me of having stolen his textbook  as he had found a form bearing my name in his other books and all my explanations fell on deaf ears.

label: shame
text: When my first sexual intercourse turned out to be a flop.  I was in a panic and ended up without an erection.

label: guilt
text: When my mother found me in her bedroom \stealing\" sugar in her bedroom.  According to our customs there comes a stage when a child stops using the parents bedroom and I was well past that age."

label: joy
text: The computer at school had left out my name along with four others and I had no rights for one year.  So I was happy to find my name on the medical schhol list.

label: fear
text: We were driving on a very dusty road at night and the driver tried to overtake a very big truck only to find another big truck parked right in front.

label: anger
text: I had gone on a vacation and my mother left home without leaving me any thing - money to come back to school.

label: sadness
text: I remember being sad whe my aunt's child died (2 days old).

label: disgust
text: I was eating in the dinning hall and some women joined me.  I could not eat with them so I left the dinning hall.

label: shame
text: I was about to share lunch with my aunt's husband when she told me that I would have to wait and eat with my cousins.

label: guilt
text: When my friends and I were caught with our girlfriends outside the school grounds when I was at the secondary school.  We were caught by the headmaster.

label: joy
text: I had been very weary all week - no letters, no phonecalls, no visitors and then my younger sister came with some cheese, a card and some pocket money for me; and she told me that she was working now.

label: fear
text: A friend gave me a lift and we met a road-block.  He tried  to turn back when an officer shouted at us to stop.  My friend took a turn suddenly and the officer raised his gun but by the time we were gone.

label: anger
text: I had worked very hard during my vacations to raise some money for a few major items (e.g a radio).  but when I arrived at the inter-city bus terminal, my hard earned money had been stolen from me.

label: sadness
text: My younger brother and sister were involved in an accident on their way back from school and my brother was quite badly hurt.

label: disgust
text: I went to the shopping centre to buy something and saw packets of Kapenta  with maggots in them. Oh !

label: shame
text: I had a misunderstanding with my father and after some time I found that I had been wrong.

label: guilt
text: A very close friend of mine invited me to spend the holidays with him.  He was very kind, good and understanding.  However it turned out that he had two of his cousins at his place.  He, however gave me everything I needed - even transport money.

label: joy
text: When my girl and I decided to get back together after our separation.

label: fear
text: I was so sick that my relatives thought that I was bewitched.  I felt like dying.

label: anger
text: When my girlfriend left me to go out with another guy, even though she knew that she was wrong.

label: sadness
text: When my girl went away for a holiday without saying good-bye to me.

label: disgust
text: When I failed my first biochemistry test.

label: shame
text: When I bought new clothes and put them on.

label: guilt
text: I was trying to have sex with my best friend's girl but she did not agree to it.

label: joy
text: When I passed successive exams to enter the school of medicine.

label: fear
text: When I went to my first dental appointment.

label: anger
text: When my father banned me from going to his sister's home due to some misunderstanding between the two.

label: sadness
text: When my girlfriend was afraid and anxious the day before taking her exam.

label: disgust
text: When my room-mate made a mess of the room after having drunk the whole night at a graduation party ceremony.

label: shame
text: When I did not inform my friends of my forthcoming birthday.

label: guilt
text: After I reluctantly refused to dine with a certain man on the same table.

label: joy
text: When my elder brother, who had gone abroad to study  for six years, came back home safe and in good health.

label: fear
text: When I entered the dissecting room for the anatomy class and saw several dead bodies lying on the benches.

label: anger
text: I was in love with a very beautiful girl and when I went back for my holidays I found her wth another guy who she said was just a friend.  Later I found them together and was convinced that there was something fishy.

label: sadness
text: When I went to see the dead body of my uncle.  This was a very dramatic expreience as it was the first time that I entered a mortuary.

label: disgust
text: I went to spend a night with a relative of mine and there I found that the bed had been wet the previous night.

label: shame
text: When the brother-in-law of a girlfriend of mine found us in a bedroom with clothes and panties spread all over the place.

label: guilt
text: The first time that I \played with myself\" despite being a Christian.  I had read in the bible that it was wrong to make love to someone one is not married to."

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had got the best result in school and would be definately selected to the university of Zambia.

label: fear
text: When I entered the dissection room for the first time and was exposed to preserved dead human bodies.

label: anger
text: When I learnt that my younger sister had been expelled from secondary school because she was pregnant.  That was the second time that this happened in the family - the first time it had been my elder sister.

label: sadness
text: When I realized that I was in hospital after a car accident and that I had a scleral tear in my left eye.

label: disgust
text: When a \friend\" woke me up in the middle of a blessful sleep by knocking on the door.  Then he started calling me names and saying that he had heard that I had been talking behind his back, this was a lie and the guy was drunk to the core."

label: shame
text: When I did not do well in the PG310 test I, I got only 4 marks above the pass marks despite my effort.  I felt bad because quite a number of friends did better.

label: guilt
text: When I realized that not all my friends like the comments that I pass in their presence.

label: joy
text: When I was accepted into the medical school.  Medicine is a profession that I have desired ever since my childhood.

label: fear
text: When the time came for me to see dead bodies and to operate on them.

label: anger
text: When I was accused of having planned my friend's outing at secondary school (boarding) as we were not allowed to go out.

label: sadness
text: When I realized the burden it was for my mother to look after all of us, all by herself.

label: disgust
text: When I heard that a woman of my community had aborted and got rid of the foetus by throwing it in the drain.

label: shame
text: When I blamed my failure to the bias and favouritism in the        marking system, in fact I had not worked hard enough.

label: guilt
text: When my friend ended up pregnant by a gentleman whom I considered to be good and faithful but he ended up neglecting her and not bothering about her.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had been selected fot the first year at the university of Zambia.  This was after my form five at Chikola secondary school.

label: fear
text: When I took the first year university exams and made a lot of mistakes in the P110 exam.  I was afraid of failing and thus being unable to go to the school of medicine.

label: anger
text: When my brother-in-law's brother stole my clothes when my brother-in-law and I had gone to cut wood for the fire.

label: sadness
text: When I heard that my father had been involved in a car accident in Lusaka.  This happened when he had gone to get the car which had been stolen in Lusaka.

label: disgust
text: When I was accused of having impregnated someone's daughter, it was the girl's cousin who had done it.

label: shame
text: When my darling found me walking hand in hand with another girl whom I loved also.

label: guilt
text: When I told my uncle a false story - that people had stolen the books from my room and I demanded money from him.  When he found out the truth I was in trouble.

label: joy
text: When I won the best prize in the National science fair.

label: fear
text: When I was chased by a big dog near my house.

label: anger
text: Being hooted at when I was learning to drive.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother died - having to see my mother weep.

label: disgust
text: When I saw a drunk man urinate upon himsellf and he seemed to be thoroughly content with it.

label: shame
text: When I had to walk home from the bus-stop in a skirt that I had soiled.  It drew a lot of attention and they all seemed to want to see the blood stains.

label: guilt
text: When I overate at lunch.

label: joy
text: When I heard the examination results and when I recovered after having been sick for a week.

label: fear
text: When my mother was seriously ill and had to be admitted to the hospital.

label: anger
text: When someone took my things without having asked for my permission.

label: sadness
text: When my father passed away.

label: disgust
text: When I went to the clinic for a medical check-up and saw the way the lecturer was conducting the lecture and the kind of responses he got from the patients.

label: shame
text: When I did something naughty and it lead to the embarrassment of my parents.

label: guilt
text: When I lied to the physiology teacher.

label: joy
text: When I learnt that I had been accepted at the medical school.

label: fear
text: While drinking a soft drink, I had the impression of swallowing   a piece of glass so I went to the district hospital and got admitted there.

label: anger
text: When my room-mate was making noise deliberately, by playing a flute early in the morning while I was trying to study.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother passed away.

label: disgust
text: I witnessed a scene in which two women were abusing each other.

label: shame
text: One morning after breakfast I was still not satisfied.  My nephew (a small boy of 2) had not eaten his breakfast and just when I was taking a bit of his share someone walked in.

label: guilt
text: I was to take a test and I had not made the necessary preparations until it was too late.  There were two days to go and I still had not done much.

label: joy
text: When I was selected to the university of Zambia.

label: fear
text: When my father was involved in an accident.

label: anger
text: When a few girls were talking rubbish about me.

label: sadness
text: When my beloved uncle was shot dead by relatives.

label: disgust
text: When I failed the entrance exam of the medical school and was studying biochemistry which has no job prospects in Zambia.

label: shame
text: When my sister became pregnant at UNZA last year.

label: guilt
text: When I got very drunk and really misbehaved at Christmas.

label: joy
text: When I was offered a place in the university as a full time student.

label: fear
text: When I was first exposed to the dead bodies, for dissecting        purposes at the school of medicine.

label: anger
text: When our government decided to withdraw student allowances as it was one of the conditions imposed by the IMF.

label: sadness
text: When my father was imprisoned for burning the house of his younger brother.

label: disgust
text: When my elder brother failed form five in 1968 when I was 5 years old.

label: shame
text: When I contacted a sexually transmitted disease and the lecturer came to know about it as it was he who treated me for it.

label: guilt
text: When I cheated my trusting girlfriend by telling her that I was a qualified doctor and later she found out that I was only a medical student at the preclinical level.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had passed the second year exams.

label: fear
text: When I was about to be bitten by my friend's dog, later on it bit me.

label: anger
text: When I heard that an acquaintance of mine was spreading rumours about my affair with a close friend.

label: sadness
text: When a close friend of mine collapsed and passed away and the illness was not known.

label: disgust
text: When my father shouted at me for going to a party with my sister.

label: shame
text: When I failed the grade seven exams.

label: guilt
text: When I forgot to cook something that my mother had told me to, and at supper time the food that I was supposed to have prepared was not there.

label: joy
text: When I qualified for form I.

label: fear
text: When I was going home for my holiday, I almost drowned in the Zambezi river.

label: anger
text: When the paramilitary was sent to the UNZA and it started using tear gas and started intimidating the students without any provocation.

label: sadness
text: When my grandfather died.

label: disgust
text: When my parents insisted that I take up a teaching career.

label: shame
text: When my cousin's wife refused him sex and claimed that she was my girllfriend.  I think that there is something wrong with the woman as I have never even thought of having sex with her.

label: guilt
text: When I beat up my brother so badly, for not having gone to school, that we had to take him to hospital.

label: joy
text: When the Cambridge results came out and I obtained a first division.  I had been thinking that I had not done very well.

label: fear
text: I was walking along the passage to my room (very near the anatomy laboratory) and I heard something and felt that there was some thing behind me.  I looked back and there was no one.  I started imagining that maybe it was a corpse.

label: anger
text: In form three we were taking our mock exams and someone else (a friend) was making noise when the examinateur picked on me and said that he would tear up my answer sheet.  I got very angry with the girls involved.

label: sadness
text: When my brother (5th in the family) passed away.

label: disgust
text: When a girl I knew aborted and threw the seven month foetus in a man-hole.

label: shame
text: As a young girl in form I, I wet my bed one day at the boarding school and many girls came to see the person who had done it as I had to take my mattress out that day.

label: guilt
text: When I laughed at a lame man walking down the road, it looked funny at the time but later I felt lousy.  It was the same day that I had stolen some coins from my mother in the shop.

label: joy
text: When I passed and qualified for the university.

label: fear
text: When my sister was very ill and was admitted to the hospital.

label: anger
text: When my father failed to send me transport money after the closure of the school.

label: sadness
text: When my parents separated temporarily and I was left behind with my father.  As I loved my mother I wanted to go with her.

label: disgust
text: When I beat up my brother in order to control him and make him obey my parents orders.

label: shame
text: When I was hungry, I tried to take the money that my mother had saved up for something else.

label: guilt
text: I encouraged my brother to play football and he was hurt while playing the game.

label: joy
text: A few weeks back I received a Christmas card from a friend in England.  She had not written to me in a very long time but it     showed that she still remembered me.

label: fear
text: The first time that I saw a dead person.  This was when I started my gross anatomy practicals.

label: anger
text: I once failed a test miserably and my friend did very well and someone made a nasty comment while comparing me to my friend.

label: sadness
text: A friend of mine got pregnant anf failed the first year at university.  The boyfriend refused his responsibility and they ended up in court.

label: disgust
text: I once saw an elderly lady who was not properly dressed.  She was wearing a transparent dress, such things are not sopposed to be seen in African society.

label: shame
text: During my childhood I once lied and my sister found out.

label: joy
text: When I heard that I had been selected for the university.

label: fear
text: When I was left alone at home one night by my brother.

label: anger
text: The government's announcement of the withdrawal of the student allowances in 1984.

label: sadness
text: When I first suffered from syphilis.

label: disgust
text: Being mistreated by my former primary school teacher, Mr Zalu.

label: shame
text: Lying to my cousin about the form five examination fees.

label: guilt
text: In September 1984 I got two girls pregnant and the families of both the girls confronted me .  The fact was that my parents were around and I felt guilty answering some of the questions.

label: joy
text: When I was with the girl I love very much, for the graduatiion ball.

label: fear
text: When I was first taken to the dissection room where I found 10 dead human bodies.

label: anger
text: I was really angry when the President general of UNZASU was arrested by policemen.

label: sadness
text: When one of my closest friends failed to make it to the third year of university.

label: joy
text: When my parents complimented me very nicely on something.

label: fear
text: When I had to talk to some strangers, from whom I was expecting a negative answer.

label: sadness
text: I wanted something in particular and did not get it, also there was no possibility of getting it.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgusted when we (family) avoided a problem which could be solved readily.

label: guilt
text: When I could not fulfill my expectations.

label: joy
text: When I got engaged to a boy of my choice.

label: fear
text: When I saw the movie \Poltergist\"."

label: anger
text: When my mother scolded me for coming home late, i.e after 7 P.M.

label: sadness
text: When my grandfather died.

label: disgust
text: When a close friend of mine maintained a relationship with me till she needed me and broke it off when she did not need me.  She behaved life a really selfish person.

label: joy
text: When I passed my B.A exams.

label: anger
text: When my boyfriend told me that it would be difficult for him to marry me.

label: sadness
text: When I left my part-time job.

label: disgust
text: I felt very disgusted at a friend to whom I had given a Psychology book to read, and she did not care to give me back the book during the exams.

label: shame
text: When an intimate friend of mine passed B.A with first class and I got only pass class.

label: guilt
text: When I did not concentrate on my studies despite my mother's help and cooperation.

label: shame
text: Failing in the English language exam.

label: guilt
text: Mentioning a book to the person who borrowed it.

label: joy
text: Being chosen to do this experiment.

label: fear
text: Finding out about people can go mad for social reasons.

label: anger
text: Someone borrowed my textbook and deliberately did not return it.

label: sadness
text: I like someone who does not like me and was rude to me.

label: disgust
text: Cueing for bath for a long time.

label: shame
text: My article not chosen by the college newspaper

label: guilt
text: I did not do my homework and went to see a film.

label: joy
text: Doing well in the examn.

label: fear
text: A relative died.

label: anger
text: Bad food in the students' dining hall.

label: sadness
text: Could not get into the university I wanted to get in.

label: disgust
text: Noisy people in the library.

label: shame
text: Meeting other friends who got in the good universities.

label: guilt
text: Telling my parents that I did not get into a good university.

label: joy
text: Getting into this university to do medicine.

label: fear
text: Before the first examn.

label: anger
text: Someone messing up the room we share.

label: sadness
text: My best friend could not get into university.

label: disgust
text: Some students trying to please the lecturer.

label: shame
text: Not chosen for all English classes.

label: guilt
text: I am not good enough to join any team to play sport for the class.

label: joy
text: Reading a nice book and talking about it to my friend.

label: fear
text: Being threatened by another person.

label: anger
text: Insulted by the class leader.

label: sadness
text: Saying goodbye to a friend.

label: disgust
text: Saw a dead rat on the street.

label: shame
text: Not doing well in the examn.

label: guilt
text: Too busy to write letters to friends and they said I had forgotten about them.

label: joy
text: Going to a concert.

label: fear
text: Got ill.

label: anger
text: Tripped on a busy street.

label: sadness
text: A child beaten up by his mother.

label: disgust
text: First anatomy lesson.

label: shame
text: Failing an examn.

label: guilt
text: Broken a friend's cup.

label: joy
text: Good dinner on the National Day.

label: fear
text: Saw a snake unexpectedly.

label: anger
text: Seeing this badly made questionnaire.

label: sadness
text: You ignored the fact that we could not hear you at the back.

label: disgust
text: Dead rat in the kitchen of the university.

label: shame
text: Failing an examn.

label: guilt
text: Did not pick up a water mellon skin, someone slipped on it.

label: joy
text: Watching the Asian Olympic game (China winning).

label: fear
text: Someone frightened me in the dark.

label: anger
text: People having a football match outside the window during the lecture.

label: sadness
text: China can not even give you good sound systems for an open lecture.

label: disgust
text: People talking in an important lecture.

label: shame
text: Not being able to hand in homework in time.

label: guilt
text: Thinking about other things in a lecture.

label: joy
text: Got a big fish in fishing.

label: fear
text: Heard some ghost-like noise at night.

label: anger
text: A father helping his kid to fight other kids.

label: sadness
text: A father of 4 children killed in an accident.

label: disgust
text: When junior doctors returned to work after bunking them.

label: shame
text: When I was caught with someone's daughter.

label: guilt
text: When the student union leaders were expelled from the university and we continued to study.

label: joy
text: When my boyfriend and I made up.

label: fear
text: When I was watching a movie in which there was a pit full of dangers and there was only a small safe place on which a man was standing; he had to catch the lady who was thrown in or else ! The pit was 20 feet deep.

label: anger
text: My mother and my sister carried on picking at me all day long for no reason at all and I ended up getting angry.

label: sadness
text: When my boyfriend almost had a relationship with a close friend of mine.

label: disgust
text: When a classmate of ours knocked on our door at 2 o'clock in the morning.  I was disgusted at his behaviour.

label: shame
text: I told a lie about someone to someone else and they found out   and questioned me about it.

label: guilt
text: I broke a cup and put it back without telling anyone about it and someone almost got blamed for it, then it was discovered that it was me who had broken it.

label: joy
text: At church camp when I accepted Christ into my life and so did my friend.

label: shame
text: I was complaining about calling people whom I didn't know. I forgot that the purpose is to invite people for dinner and get to know them.

label: guilt
text: Whenever I see poverty and starvation. I live in an affluent society and am privileged to have many opportunities.

label: joy
text: During the summer I received grade cards from my TA's. I expected a B no better in Computer Science. I looked at the card - I got an A - I was ecstatic.

label: fear
text: English papers are due on Friday. They are returned on Tuesday. This Tuesday I was afraid to go to class and get my paper because I knew it was bad.

label: anger
text: A friend of mine came to visit and stayed with my roommate and me. My roommate and she became good friends. After she left, he didn't talk too highly of her.

label: sadness
text: After receiving the grade on the paper mentioned in FEAR.

label: disgust
text: Seeing a person panhandling money on Telegraph.

label: shame
text: After the car accident in GUILT.

label: guilt
text: The night of a high school dance, I went partying and collided with another car. Both cars were totalled; people were injured but not seriously.

label: joy
text: When seeing a friend that I had not seen in a long while.

label: fear
text: Fear of doing well on a midterm.

label: anger
text: I felt anger at my roommate due to his habit of leaving dirty dishes in the sink and generally not cleaning after himself.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother after staying with us for awhile went back home.

label: disgust
text: I felt disgust as a result of one of my midterms - I thought I had prepared well for it, but the end result wasn't what I had expected.

label: shame
text: I felt shame when I saw someone I knew and pretended not to see her. Later she saw me and said hi.

label: guilt
text: In neglecting some work that had to be done around the house and telling my roommate I would get it done.

label: joy
text: Achieving my goal at a swim meet. I worked toward the goal for 9 yrs. I was capable of achieving it, but I didn't know when.

label: fear
text: Housesitting and hearing the alarm go off. I knew someone had to be breaking in. I called the police and was panicking while on the phone. It was awful. It turns out that I stepped on the hidden alarm without prior knowledge of its existance.

label: anger
text: Going to Cowell Hospital and finding out tediously that I had a stress fracture. The anger came when the senile doctors found out 4 weeks later that I had 2 stress fractures in one foot and should have had crutches. I was in distinct pain and barely could walk to classes. They said it would be better in 2 weeks.

label: sadness
text: Losing my job that I had for 4 summers. I took it personally and cried for 6 hours off and on. I wanted to hide away and did for a few days.

label: disgust
text: Seeing a friend \making love\" to a high school girl. I accidentally was dragged into this room where the happenings had occurred. I was disgusted at the reality."

label: shame
text: I borrowed a gold bracelet without the girl's knowledge. I had it for so long I had to keep it. To this day I feel ashamed at myself for having it. I never wear the thing anymore.

label: guilt
text: After moving out of my apt. I took all the furniture and dishes and everything. It was mine but I took it all just to spite my roomies. We had a few (a lot) of disagreements. I felt guilt for moving out for the bad reasons.

label: joy
text: It was the weekend of my homecoming. I saw my sister for the first time in 3 months. She's my best friend and extremely close.

label: fear
text: After my shoulder operation, I woke up in the hospital room alone. I was in pain and was still under heavy medications. I could not find my parents.

label: anger
text: When I found out my cousin had been killed. I was angry at the world, and her murderer who was her ex-boyfriend. It was the worst and most hateful day of my life.

label: sadness
text: I spent a weekend in San Diego visiting my boyfriend Rob. We were at the airport and my plane was just about so leave. After saying goodbye, I boarded the plane. It was the hardest thing to do and it was a sad trip home.

label: disgust
text: I was supposed to be studying for my math midterm a few days ago, however, I fooled around with my roommate, and didn't start studying until 12:00 am. I was disgusted with myself.

label: shame
text: Since I've been here I haven't written to any of my relatives. I got a letter from my mom telling me how upset my grandparents are from not hearing from me.

label: joy
text: I got an A in anatomy - the first one I have ever gotten in a science class here.

label: fear
text: A man in a car was following me when I went running early one morning in a fairly secluded area.

label: anger
text: I caught a \peeping tom\" at my window when I was getting undressed."

label: sadness
text: Saying goodbye at the airport to my boyfriend who has to go to school back East. We are very close and have been together 4 years.

label: disgust
text: My parents claimed me on their income tax after I had been out of the house for two years receiving no financial support from them. As result I had to work more during school because they were expected by the FAO to contribute to my education when they refuse to do so.

label: shame
text: I was wearing a short skirt one day and someone told me my underwear was showing.

label: guilt
text: Getting a D in a class last semester and knowing it was because I didn't study.

label: joy
text: Went to a movie with a date, walked on the beach (in Alameda) spent some time afterwards in her apt.

label: fear
text: At age 10 my foster grandmother died, I had a fear of dying.

label: anger
text: I am currently taking CS 50P. I had to finish a couple of assignments but I was hindered because I could not get a passing score on my program.

label: sadness
text: The girl I was seeing didn't want to have a serious relationship.

label: disgust
text: I found out that someone that I knew had someone else taking tests for her.

label: shame
text: One night a friend found out that I dumped one girl for another and he proceded to lecture me.

label: guilt
text: I called off a relationship with one girl so I could see another.

label: joy
text: I asked someone to go out and she accepted right away.

label: fear
text: I was driving and stopped at a stop light. I was planning to make a right turn as soon as it was clear. It was clear on the left so I started but a man was just in front of the car.

label: anger
text: During a dance someone slashed my tires and dumped paint on my car. I had four other friends with me that I drove and furthermore it was raining.

label: sadness
text: When I was trying for a girl who I really liked and cared for and thought she felt the same way too. But she didn't like the idea and just wanted to stay friends.

label: disgust
text: When I lose on my bets on anything - baseball, football, basketball, track, craps, poker, or arcade - whether its 5 dollars or 200 I feel that I should never have done it in the first place.

label: shame
text: I took my math midterm and got it back the following Wednesday in class. It was a totally low grade.

label: guilt
text: My mom told me not to gamble, but I did anyway. Sometimes I would even take some money from my parents and brother. She found out and yelled at me.

label: joy
text: Finished a difficult midterm.

label: fear
text: I confronted a bigger person than I and almost got into a fight.

label: anger
text: I was called racial slurs behind my back.

label: sadness
text: My grandmother died during Christmas break several years ago.

label: disgust
text: Saw a scene in a movie implying incest as humorous.

label: shame
text: When given responsibility to grade papers in elementary school, I cheated a little and graded my own higher.

label: guilt
text: When I was a kid I stole toys from other kids.

label: joy
text: Did very, very well on a Physics midterm.

label: fear
text: Alone in the house (late 8pm) I heard noises. Sounded like someone was trying to get in our back door.

label: anger
text: A friend doesn't let me study when I want to. She doesn't feel I need to study and doesn't understand how important studying is to me. I get very angry with her.

label: sadness
text: Death of a pet rabbit. We had to give it away because my brother became allergic to it. We gave it to a man who kept animals and lots of other animals for children to watch. We went to visit our rabbit. It was badly beaten by the other rabbits and eventually died.

label: disgust
text: When I stand at the bus stop for one hour waiting for the bus to arrive.

label: shame
text: When I sat in the wrong discussion section in the beginning of the semester. I insisted on being in the right section and the TA's list should have included my name. When I found out that I was in the wrong, I apologized, turned red and left.

label: guilt
text: About not helping my sister when she asked me to help her on her chemistry class. I pretended to be busy.

label: joy
text: When I won my car.

label: fear
text: Going to take my driving test.

label: anger
text: I came home one day and discovered that my sister had borrowed my car and had gotten into an accident with it. My entire front bumper was destroyed.

label: sadness
text: When I heard the news that my grandfather had died.

label: disgust
text: When a friend of mine keeps telling me morbid things that happened to his dog.

label: shame
text: When I purposely locked my babysitter out of the house at age 4 because I DIDN'T LIKE HER.

label: guilt
text: When I did not go to work because I had to study for a midterm.

label: joy
text: At a party in which I met an interesting female. We enjoyed eachothers company, while slow dacing.

label: fear
text: A friend and I were going to have a study session together in which we quiz ourselves in biology material. Because I believed I didn't study enough. I feared I would fail.

label: anger
text: I live with my sister now and sometimes she angers me especially when she thinks I don't keep the apt. clean enough.

label: sadness
text: When I found out that I could not go to the concert (after buying the tickets) because of a biology test which occurred the morning after.

label: disgust
text: Right now I volunteer at a hospital. Yesterday, Halloween, I dressed up as a doctor and went to work. The volunteer coordinator told me after my shift that it was dangerous to have done what I did.

label: shame
text: When I get an exam back with a grade that I did not desire. Then I get mad at myself and say that I could have done better.

label: guilt
text: After days or weekends where I did not accomplish the amount of sudying that I wanted to because of more pleasant activities which come up.

label: joy
text: Last year my freshman yr. It was a day in March I did well on some tests. I seemed to finally adjust to college, it was hot and sunny. I was walking in front of a frat. when I heard Beach Boys \Surfin'USA\". I had this overwhelming feeling that to be at CAL was good. I still have it somewhat."

label: fear
text: During one year my mother almost had a nervous breakdown and my father had a serious operation. I was afraid that our family (4 kids, I'm the oldest) wouldn't hold together. Everything turned out fine.

label: anger
text: Last semester when I dated a girl whom I've known for almost a year. However one night she said she wanted us to be \just friends\". I confided this to a friend Jim I was really suffering. A month or two later he broke up with his old girlfriend and they started going out regularly. I have no girlfriend nor have I had a romantic relationship of any significance. I feel some anger but we are friends again."

label: sadness
text: When I was a Sr. in HS. one of the class counselors died of hepatitis. She was very sensitive. She knew my shyness and drew me out to improve myself image. I missed her funeral - so I could not publically grieve. My parents didn't understand.

label: disgust
text: I applied for a job of GALSO counselor and I made the strongest possible application but was denied an interview. I felt disgusted at the system which by promoting the cause of minorities makes employing whites lowest priority.

label: shame
text: I was angry about 3 months ago and I kicked backwards against the wall. It caved in and so I had to show it to my parents. I had been angry after my mother said something to me about not being able to find clothes in my size - something that I'm sensitive about. (6' 5'' 210)

label: guilt
text: When I lied last week. I lied to someone to get info. for a paper I was writing. I told her that the info. was for a newspaper article. I was afraid if I told the truth she wouldn't help me.

label: joy
text: Someone (a boy) paid special attention to me.

label: fear
text: Getting back my Psych 140 midterm.

label: anger
text: My roommate leaving my drawers in a mess after plowing thourgh them looking for something.

label: sadness
text: My friend who was in the Bago was kicked out of the sorority.

label: disgust
text: A friend of mine had sex with someone of a different race on a Winnebago trip down to USC in front of everyone (all my friends embarrassed my sorority house name).

label: shame
text: When I lied to my best friend about a boy she really liked but he didn't like her. I told her he did and she bugged him for a long time embarrassing herself.

label: guilt
text: I'm allergic to most foods - eating something that I'm allergic to caused guilt.

label: joy
text: My last genetices midterm - a decent grade.

label: fear
text: A certain night during initiation.

label: anger
text: When someone threw a firecracker into my room at 7:00 am in the morning.

label: sadness
text: A close friend of the family died.

label: disgust
text: When other people refuse to do their house jobs and give the work to someone else.

label: shame
text: Not doing my share of the work for the house job.

label: guilt
text: Forgetting a close friend's birthday.

label: joy
text: I received an unexpected B+ on an engineering midterm. I did not study nearly as much as I should have and it was a difficult test.

label: fear
text: I could not do the questions on my math midterm.

label: anger
text: I was supposed to meet my girlfriend at a pre-arranged place but it took me an hour to find her.

label: sadness
text: My grandmother died over the summer. I knew her very well, she baked great biscuits. She was in the hospital but expected to improve and go home soon. She died in her sleep.

label: disgust
text: I saw part of a Prince video with him crawling out of a bath tub.

label: shame
text: My grand father caught me eating his private jelly bean supply.

label: guilt
text: I slammed my little brother into a wall because he was bothering me.

label: joy
text: Finding out my grades at the end of my freshman year.

label: fear
text: When I was going to bring back my girlfriend to LA to meet my parents.

label: anger
text: When I found out that my good friend and roommate did not pay the phone bill and electric bill like he promised and let me down.

label: sadness
text: When I found out that my girlfriend would not be coming back to UCB for one semester, but would be living in San Jose.

label: disgust
text: Finding out my grades at the end of my Sophomore year.

label: shame
text: When I found out my roommate had been talking behind my back about very personal things.

label: guilt
text: When I was about 17 years old and I stole some pens from a stationery store because I didn't have enough money.

label: joy
text: Going to Chico to visit a friend.

label: fear
text: First day back on the job.

label: anger
text: When the person I'm having the affair with won't talk to me in public.

label: sadness
text: My roommate's sister committed suicide.

label: disgust
text: When I was getting so fat.

label: shame
text: Lying to my grandparents about visiting my boyfriend in Chico.

label: guilt
text: Having an affair with my good friend's best friend. And every time I see my best friend I feel guilt because we can't tell him.

label: joy
text: When  fell in love with my present girlfriend.

label: fear
text: When there was a bomb threat in Tolman Hall. This was the first time that I felt my life could be in danger.

label: anger
text: When people would tell me that my ex-girlfriend was playing around on me.

label: sadness
text: When my grandmother passed away.

label: disgust
text: When I study my butt off for a midterm and still get an average grade.

label: shame
text: When I was 10, I got busted for stealing a candy-bar.

label: guilt
text: When I copy someone else's problem set.

label: joy
text: I got a very good grade on one of my midterms a few weeks ago.

label: fear
text: My mom called early in the morning (On a Monday) and I had just seen her that weekend. I couldn't understand what could be so important as to make her call at such a strange hour. I missed the call and had to call her back that afternoon.

label: anger
text: My peers didn't want me to meet someone during rush for fear that I would give her a bad outlook on our Sororoty house. I shouldn't have seen this, but they blew and I did.

label: sadness
text: I was told that a friend of a friend committed suicide.

label: disgust
text: Doing poorly on a midterm.

label: shame
text: My boat didn't win a race which we were favored to win.

label: guilt
text: Sleeping through crew practice one Monday morning.

label: joy
text: When I had achieved a goal indirectly. I work for CAL Football and our 2nd win of the season was very gratifying and brought our joy because of the hard work involved and the fact that no one expected we would win.

label: fear
text: Upon reading a story on a serial killer by the name of Henry Lee Lucas who has been given the distinction of killing more people that any other man. I began to wonder if I should take more care for my safety.

label: anger
text: I had worked long and hard on a project when a friend inadvertantly destroyed it. I could not forgive him for a long time. And at times still get angry at him.

label: sadness
text: When a pet died. The pet was the closest friend I had for 15 years.

label: disgust
text: When people/press analyze a particular newsworthy item (CAL Football team) which I am a member and can only see the situation in a bad light and always put the team down.

label: shame
text: Recently, some friends and I had too much to drink while on a foot-ball road trip to USC. We trashed our hotel room and I felt ashamed when the maid walked in the next morning.

label: guilt
text: I felt guilty when I mislead a person into thinking he was a close friend when that person was more of a casual acquaintance.

label: joy
text: Getting my accentance letter from CAL.

label: fear
text: One summer when I was camping with friends they devised and elaborate plan to scare me by having our camp attecked by a wild animal (one of them) and then convincing the campground was the home of a satanic organization.

label: anger
text: I went out dancing and found my boyfriend kissing another girl.

label: sadness
text: At the end of my senior yr. in high school I found out that a friend of mine I knew had cancer had been diagnosed as terminally ill.

label: disgust
text: Sitting in the dorm when the guys were verbally reading letters in Penthouse.

label: shame
text: I slipped on butter one evening in the Dining Commons landed on my rear causing my tray also to land on the floor.

label: guilt
text: A person I was attracted to walked me home in the rain and got sick.

label: joy
text: Today I did a lot better on my architecture project than I expected.

label: fear
text: When I was little I lost control of my bike and started to go into a buay intersection but my neighbor stopped me just in time.

label: anger
text: This summer I got into a fight with one of our patrons (at a theatre). He hit me and I hit him and her friend, he hit my friend and we all hit eachother.

label: sadness
text: This monday I took a Math 1BS test and flunked for the second time.

label: disgust
text: When I found out the CIA was mining Nicaraguan harbors.

label: shame
text: A month ago I turned in an English paper in late after I had already had a previous paper late and promised not to do it again.

label: guilt
text: I forgot my mother's and sister's birthdays (they fall on the same day).

label: joy
text: When I received a letter of acceptance to CAL.

label: fear
text: A time when I was very afraid of something was when I broke my father's antique lamp.

label: anger
text: When someone told a secret I told them not to tell.

label: sadness
text: When my mother was very sick and almost died.

label: disgust
text: When I saw President Reagan get elected.

label: shame
text: When I failed some tests my first year at CAL.

label: guilt
text: When I stole something.

label: joy
text: I gave my mom a gift she wanted for years. I raflected her joy.

label: fear
text: Walking through campus at night a squirrel jumped in front of me.

label: anger
text: After a long trip in my dad's van without incident I stopped to fill the tank with gas and dented the side of the van against the pole. Then my cars electrical system would not work when I tried to drive home from his house.

label: sadness
text: At one point in a relationship, my boyfriend was seeing an old flame more than me. At our confrontation tears were shed.

label: disgust
text: When a skunk invaded camp.

label: shame
text: I made an unkind remark about the ethnicity of some friends without realizing it.

label: guilt
text: I mangled the side of my dad's van on a fence. I did not realize the extent of the damage until he showed it to me the next day. The shock on my face was genuine so a friend interceded with a good excuse which I did not deny. I never clarified the situation.

label: joy
text: When I finally got a job after days of wondering whether I would be hired or not and counting on the money that it would bring.

label: fear
text: When I had to walk home in the dark for the first time.

label: anger
text: A time when, as part of my work, I was sent out actually sort of volunteered to run an errand for someone who had no authority to send me out and the address was very far especially on foot and turned out to be incorrect too. The whole trip was a waste.

label: sadness
text: When my boyfriend said he did not want to see me anymore (which turned out to be untrue).

label: disgust
text: When my roommate forgets to flush the toilet.

label: shame
text: When I did poorly on a test and I knew that there wasn't an excuse for not doing better. Made mistakes I could not believe I made.

label: guilt
text: Remembering (at the time I did not feel guilt) in recent yrs. how angry I would get when I was babysitting my new brother and he would not stop crying. I did not do anything harmful or shocking. But I feel guilty for treating him the way I did especially since I adore him now. That's why I spoil him now.

label: joy
text: Yesterday when I received a B on a history midterm. I felt overjoyed after having received C's previously.

label: fear
text: When I began school at UC. The pre-enrollment the classes, and the question of success really scared me.

label: anger
text: A month ago when one of my fellow workers got a promotion over me. It was just a small promotion but recognition was involved.

label: sadness
text: When another fellow worker decided to leave the company. We had been very close and we would not be able to work with eachother any longer.

label: disgust
text: Through the media and their presentation of a kidnapped child who was raped.

label: shame
text: When I had not been accepted to a college which I dreamed of going to. I felt that I had let myself and my parents down.

label: guilt
text: I told my parents (or more realistically) would not do what they wanted me to do anymore. I guess I sort of betrayed them after all they had done for me.

label: joy
text: When I drove partially across the country with my father. We stopped in a few towns and stayed overnight in motels. The joy I got was from the feedom I felt and the real beauty of the country.

label: fear
text: One day before Christmas, I went shopping with my brother and his friend. We had a good time. But on the way home we were almost in an accident because the weather was bad.

label: anger
text: I can't remember being truly angry. Usually it's just disappointment that I feel. One situation would be with my brother. He and I used to be close but now he seems to be avoiding me.

label: sadness
text: 4 years ago my family decided to move from New York to California. From the time we decided to move until the time we left, I realized how much my friends cared for me. When we left and for a long time after that I was very sad.

label: disgust
text: Once when I was babysitting for some neighbors children I found roaches in ther bathroom. I had never seen a roach before but I called my mother to make sure that's what they were. And she came over and checked.

label: shame
text: The first time I slept at my boyfriends house and had to walk down the hall to the shower in front of his housemates. I felt they were judging me.

label: guilt
text: I was at school and afterwards went to work. After work I went to see a friend and stayed out late. when I got home my mother was awake and I felt guilty.

label: joy
text: The last time I had sex.

label: fear
text: after getting a fail notice for a math class, I realized I was not doing very well in school in any subject. I began to fear failing a class or two.

label: anger
text: Physically fighting with my girlfriend because she just walked out of a room of my friends and had pushed and cursed at me when I went to find her.

label: sadness
text: Hearing about a friend back home that had to have his stomach pumped because he had overdosed on pills.

label: disgust
text: After learning on the news about this man who killed more than 300 women and habitually copulated into their inert bodies.

label: shame
text: I had just masterbated with another boy.

label: guilt
text: Going out with another girl besides my girlfriend and not telling her.

label: joy
text: Reading a letter from a close friend who said he missed me and cared for me.

label: fear
text: Going to CAL not knowing anyone.

label: anger
text: When a close friend did not write.

label: sadness
text: Leaving high school.

label: disgust
text: When my roommate came home at 10 in the morning after sleeping with a guy she did not know because she got drunk. (Se has a boyfriend too).

label: shame
text: Fooling around with this guy I did not know.

label: guilt
text: Not noticing my roommates quietness or a sign of discomfort.

label: joy
text: I went home and visited with my family and friends.

label: fear
text: Taking a chemistry midterm.

label: anger
text: While I was away for the weekend some friends went into my room and played my very expensive stereo without asking me or my roommate.

label: sadness
text: I asked a girl out on a date and she said no.

label: disgust
text: I was playing a sport in an advanced PE class and many of the people were not advanced.

label: shame
text: I bought a possible answer to a homework problem which was completely inapplicable to the question due to my not having read about the subject matter.

label: guilt
text: Lately I've felt guilty because I'm folling behind in my classes and not studying much.

label: joy
text: Returning to school and rejoining my girlfriend after 3 months of separation from summer.

label: fear
text: Waiting for my girlfriend to come from her apt. to mine. She was very late and I thought something awful had happened.

label: anger
text: I bought a new bed for my apt. and it squeaks when you move on it. I tried to fix it but could not.

label: sadness
text: Finding out that my grandfather had died. He lived in England and I had not seen him for 10 years.

label: disgust
text: Cleaning the bathroom of my apt. and realizing my roommate who had lived there all summer by himself had never cleaned the place.

label: shame
text: Doing poorly on an exam that I thought I should do well.

label: guilt
text: Criticizing my mother when she refused to drive with the radio on. I told her that I thought she wasn't intelligent enough to cope with the radio.

label: joy
text: My boyfriend and I were getting dressed up and putting make-up on to go to a Halloween Party. We were dressing up to be two mimes. It was very enjoyable and I thought we looked really good, it was an accomplishment. We were alone in his house.

label: fear
text: I needed a recommendation for something. I decided that the best person to get one from was a professor who I had never talked to before. I felt a lot of fear going up after class to ask him to recommend me considering he had never heard my name before. But I did.

label: anger
text: I had been searching for housing for Fall at UCB and I was finally offered a place - then an ordeal followed, first I accepted then refused - related to my parents judgment (they're paying for me). Turns out that I was so upset at what my Dad said to me that I hung up on him. He called back and threatened to cut me off financially and emotionally.

label: sadness
text: We got news that my (almost) 21 years old brother died while visiting Europe of a cerebral hemorhage. It finally hit me an hour after we saw his corpse in the coffin. It felt like a door between himself and everything had closed and locked forever.

label: disgust
text: I was reading in the paper the feature on Henry Lucas who claims to have killed 380 people. He was a recreational killer and a necrophiliac and zoophiliac. He has raped and beaten many women and killed men too.

label: shame
text: The people on my floor last year were very close. This year 4 of our best friends live together in an apartment. My boyfriend and I dropped by on one of their birthdays and stayed for dinner. Two other people had already been invited and I felt uncomfortable and unwanted. Then I realized I was the one who always called them and they rarely call me.

label: guilt
text: I was talking to my mom on the phone and she told me that she had just gotten an award that day in front of all these people and she asked me if I wanted her to send me the article in the temple newsletter to me. I said no very quickly and felt guilty for not being more interested and hurting her feelings.

label: joy
text: When I found our my mother didn't have cancer.

label: fear
text: I was alone and someone tried to break in from our back door.

label: anger
text: When some friends betrayed my friendship.

label: sadness
text: When I did bad on a chamistry midterm which I could have done well.

label: disgust
text: When an employer of my younger sister (17 yrs) made a \pass\" at her."

label: shame
text: Defying my parents and staying out all night when I wasn't supposed to.

label: guilt
text: Yelled at my parents for not buying me a car like other parents.

label: joy
text: Riding home from school after completing two midterms in two days, and feeling I did well on them.

label: fear
text: Occured while preparing for a midterm in Social Welfare that I thought was going to be very hard and felt unprepared for.

label: anger
text: Argument with roommate over a lock he had put on kitchen cupboard without telling anyone.

label: sadness
text: Day time robbery of our house.

label: disgust
text: Robbery mentioned under sadness.

label: shame
text: Caught lying to my father about a speeding ticket I had received.

label: guilt
text: Getting a friend an open container ticket because I got caught speeding.

label: joy
text: When I found out I got accepted to Berkeley.

label: fear
text: Before I moved away from home, I feared leaving.

label: anger
